trans-unit.target: Allow not a single imp to escape!
There are too many of them!
Hostile sylphs approach! Draw your weapons!
We must keep the roads safe!
These knaves must be taught a lesson!
It is the beans they are after!
What are ziz doing this far east!?
The bud! We must protect the bud!
Take care. Something has the opo-opos in a frenzy.
Seven hells! It's time for a change in plans.
Would someone be so kind as to assist us?
My wares! Those damned goblins have made off with my wares!
Would ye look at all them golems!
Not <var 1A 02 /var>more<var 1A 01 /var> imps! They'll have all our honey!
At this rate, there'll be no flowers left at all!
Get this man away from me!
Seek you audience with the king?
I want to hear you sing!
Ulp! I just wanted to drink my mead in peace!
Come! The Wood Wailers seek volunteers!
Ye may've made it this far, but ye ain't gettin' out alive.
Hit me with all you have!
There are too many of them!
Tonight we shall poach the poachers!
Are the resources of the city<var 1F /var>state so thinly stretched that they must send adventurers to do their dirty work?
Damn you all! The forest is not yours to claim!
Lustyeye uplanders seek goodgobbies' gobbiepack goodies?
Backwalk with fastness, uplander! Or else...ba-boom!
Narrowheart uplander seeks overtossing of good Gobbiekeep! Stikflix backpays with much fireboom!
Oh! Such soreness of gut! Might we be making busydeal? No?
Fellow creatures! Come, follow this one!
This one will suffer at the hands of the grounded ones no more!
I could have taken him... Honest!
The Order has no need for milksops!
High time I should check the crops...
The ladybugs! They're attacking the bees!
Someone help! The poor honeybees don't stand a chance!
The harvest will be a good one this season. I can feel it! You have my thanks!
Why, you sneaky flying rat! I'll see you never eat another Lalafell!
Sod off, ye sack o' squirrel shite!
How's about I escort ye off the premises?
I spy a throat needs slittin'!
They are too quick for me... I am done for...
I don't believe they will follow any further.
You have done a great service for Ul'dah.
Slay the rabid beasts before they can force their way to the Zephyr Gate!
I fear my pursuers may have circled around, and await us ahead.
If the Amalj'aa have already made it this far, they will use this place to trap us.
Little Ala Mhigo is close, but not close enough. Look alive, friend!
How did ye find this place!?
Come closer. I'll slit yer throat and toss yer corpse to the mad serpent.
Wh-Where are me men!? Wh-Where are me maidens!?
Try an' catch me, ye two-legged lubber!
Back fer more, eh? I sharpened me blade, just fer this very occasion.
The boss ain't goin' to like this one bit...
Kindly uplander! Gobbieflock needs quick hand-lending!
Pshkohhh... Overmany deepsores... Blood and bile! Blood and bile!
Uplander saves gobbieflock! Huzzah! Zah hah!
Kindly uplander now taking gobbie jinglyshine!
Shkoh! Shkoh! More fastness! More fastness!
Shkoh! Brayflox shall see to thunderfoot!
Shkoh! Shkoh! More backstrike! More forestrike!
Psheew... Brayflox backwalks from foregate of deathpit!
Shkoh! Shkoh! Gobfists of Brayflox are having no match!
Shkoh! Shkoh! Present for kindly uplander!
Shkoh! Shkoh! Victory for Brayflox! Longstop is not overturning!
Brayflox is come to give goodly uplander gobbie hand-lending!
There! Thunderclaw is blood and bile!
Yes, yes! More tongueflaps! More tongueflaps!
Help! Someone! I'm being chased by jackals!
Please! I didn't mean any harm!
What in the seven hells is that thing!?
No man in his right mind would fish here!
You haven't had enough, have you!?
Suck it up, lad! You're a storm soldier now!
Something's wrong... I can feel it...
A disgrace! Each and every one of you!
I suppose it's time I be makin' the rounds.
I have a bad feelin' 'bout this.
If I never see another cave bat, it'll be too soon.
You stay the hells away from my stock, you filthy flyin' rat!
Me dodos! Someone save me poor dodos!
We cannot let these bats out to feed. Their bite'll drive both man and beast to madness!
Today is the day! The miller's daughter will finally be mine!
Many have visited the maiden's garden, yet her flower remains unplucked.
Ah, milady. Will you forgive me for my tardiness?
Out here, all alone... I was so frightened!
Why did you wish to see me so far from town?
Ah yes, let me explain, my love...
Your eyes are like sapphires, your lips, rubies. And your breasts... Those br─
Save you!? Who's going to save me!?
It's your fault we're out here in the first place!
Don't ever call on me again, coward!
B-But I never got the chance to tell you about your br─
<sigh> I wonder if she has a sister...
Hah hah! Right into me hands!
What does it look like I'm doing?
Have at 'em lads! Ye keep what ye kill!
The damned gobdaw's at it again!
Quiet down before I shut you up myself!
I'll show you what we here at the Quay think of stowaways.
Step aside, honeybee. I's no quarrel wiv yer ilk.
I paid fer me passage, proper. The damn captain's fillin' yer ears with gobshite.
I could use a little help over here, sir!
So it's a fight ye all want, eh?
That quiet you down, did it?
May the mighty serpent drag yer arses all the way down to the abyss!
So, are you finally ready to talk?
I's less 'an naught to say to you and yers.
Then to the brig it is. Grab the shackles, men.
No... Not there again. Anywhere but there! Please! I'll tell you all you want to know! Honest!
Godsdammit to the seventh hell and back!
No man can rule Ahctstymm Shadowlurker!
Get them gropers off me grog!
Sod off! I drink what I want.
<var 1A 02 /var>I'll<var 1A 01 /var> cut ye a new gob so's that ye can drink all grog ye like!
Not afore I cut ye a new piss'ole!
Get yer hands off me, honeybees!
Kill every last one of them!
Don't let those ants take another child!
Those accursed goats will see this desert reduced to a...well, a desert!
The lizards march west! We must intercept them!
Amalj'aa raiders! Men! To your positions!
Those bothersome imps are up to no good!
The Amalj'aa approach! Meet them in field!
What are landtraps doing in the desert!?
I told those damn Ala Mhigans to cover their piss!
They say the dead rise from the abyss each night to claim the souls of the living.
You sound as if you believe that bilge!
Hah! You're worse than my skin and blister!
Didn't your ma ever tell you!? There's no such thing as ghosts!
It l-l-l-looks awfully big to be a f-f-firefly...
Then it's a ship...or a lighthouse...or a...uh...
It's the rats... I can hear their squeaking!
The exercise is open to all who wish to join!
Why flour? Why not millioncorn or ogre pumpkins or grapes?
This place is simply crawling with yarzons!
The goblins'll be here any moment, and then, not a single cog'll be safe!
My appointment! Whatever shall I tell them!?
But how am I to get from <var 1A 02 /var>here<var 1A 01 /var> to <var 1A 02 /var>there<var 1A 01 /var>?
A good beating─that's what these recruits need.
One day, that wench'll be mine.
One day, that wench'll be mine.
And I say yer full of crab shite!
And I say yer full of...of...more crab shite!
Alright, you two. Clap the traps. She ain't neither of yours.
This ain't none of your business.
Aye, this is between me and this here sod.
Excellent work, men. The checkpoint is secure!
Thal's balls! You think it will be any easier when the imperials come!?
We did it! The day is ours!
This bodes ill for the checkpoint...
Heh heh. That should teach the lads.
It seems my recruits aren't the only ones who are soft...
I see the caravans now. The oranges will be safe!
These oranges are off to the pleasure boats, you say? Might be I should see the crates there myself.
The bridge is ours once again!
Bleedin' honeybees... You'd best sleep with one eye open!
The galagos! They're gone! I can finally deliver my flour to market!
Pickman! Pickman! Worthy, we are not!
In the name of Titan, Lord of Crags, crushed shall you be!
Well, now that's settled, I can get back to work.
Doesn't look like the goblins did too much damage.
Another shipment lost...and the new one will come out of my pay...
Allow a single peiste to cross and I'll see to it you're docked a full moon's salary!
Next season's catch is safe...for now.
The coblyns have withdrawn. Return to barracks!
Ye dinnae get et. <var 08 E905 ((Thank ye.)) ((Will ye be me new da?)) /var>
The children are safe! Now let us fill that hole!
I really should be off. I mustn't keep the noble ladies waiting!
Ah, let us marvel in the beauty of the desert! (Just disregard those goat corpses.)
Crawl back under your rocks, foul lizards!
Wine and glory to the victors!
One day this land will be ours again!
<var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> aren't an imp, are you? Hah hah! I jest!
The desert is no place for rose...ling.
You haven't seen the last of us!
Mayhap this will teach those degenerates to piss elsewhere.
I couldn't have made it on my own. You have our gratitude.
Foolish are the sons of man. The past is to be left to slumber.
Is that all? Might be you left your member at home with your blade.
If you think you can do any better, I invite you to try.
Hah! I've felt bigger stings from a flea bite.
Spineless cravens is what you all are!
But I will see you again! I swear it!
Is there no one who can offer me a challenge?
Get out of there, you hellssent vermin!
Pay the toll! Pay the toll!
Empty yer purse out on the bridge and we'll let ye live long enough to watch us gather up the gil.
The flour! Won't anyone think of the <var 1A 02 /var>flour<var 1A 01 /var>!?
Why won't these galagos leave the mill be!?
Pain, you will suffer! Titan knows!
Titan sees all! Our pain, He knows!
Succumb, you will to the cold of the crag!
Not the cogs! It took ages for those to arrive!
I did naught to deserve this!
Wretched swamp spawn! I'd club you myself if I had a big enough stick!
You are a plague on the realm!
Run! Cower behind your stone walls!
We grow weary of your impudence!
Throw down your arms and you will be spared an eternity of damnation!
Slip open yer purse, like. Or I'll cut it for ye.
No coin, ye say? What've ye hidin' in them smallclothes, then?
We must hurry. It is unwise to pause on the shifting sands.
The Amalj'aa watch from afar. If we are lucky, they will leave us be.
Do not let the silence of the sand fool you!
These relics could reveal the secrets of eras past. They must be cataloged!
I am fortunate to have you by my side.
Babaroon is hungry for some crunchies! Adventurer crunchy?
Babaroon has a bubbly pot! Throws you in the bubbly pot!
They'll soon be at it again, I fear. The two are stubborn as logs.
Ignore the grunts! We seek out their leader!
There is no sight of the commander. He must be here somewhere!
No matter. We can still sabotage their supplies!
He can't have withdrawn already. I <var 1A 02 /var>saw<var 1A 01 /var> him with mine own two eyes!
For coin and country! We have stayed the lizards' hand!
We can only hope our efforts gave the reinforcements enough time...
Tally our losses and burn the bodies!
You have my thanks and the thanks of Ul'dah!
Watch for their sting! The poison can cripple a grown aurochs!
What ever should I do, Mother? I can find only boot laces and tumbleweed...
I did it, Mother! Everything will be alright!
Is there not a single adventurer who would assist me?
With these stones I shall prove my disbelievers wrong!
Let us dispose of this rubbish!
The sultana's pigs've come to wallow!
Don't think an Ala Mhigan'll fall that easily, pigs!
Gah! You leave me no choice...
Apologies, my captain. I've failed you...
Ah, and here's the dung heap.
The Corpse Brigade will never perish!
Keep the rats off our bridge!
Don't give those vermin an ilm!
Qiqirn bandits! Hide the little ones!
See that the supplies are safe!
The villagers! The rats look to capture them!
Keep those damned paws off me!
Not the Bowl of Embers! Just kill me now!
Take me if you must, but spare my wife!
And the machine roars to life!
Come, my ladies! Let us take the fight to them!
No one dies under my watch. Captain's orders!
There is nothing to fear, but a painful death at the hands of a beastman.
Who shall man the lever tonight, ladies!?
Don't you dare lay a claw upon me!
Did you see that, ladies? Did you?
Would you look how his chest heaves?
See how the sweat glistens on his brow!
I'd take an arrow in the thigh for you, Captain!
Tonight it is I who shall man the lever!
As long as the captain stands, we cannot be struck down!
I'll rip out your eyes and cast them into the chasm!
You won't get far, northborn scum!
The sun gives us light so that we may hunt in Her name!
The sun on our heads and blood on our hands! Life is good, my sisters!
Lower your bows! Today, we hunt no more.
Wherever did I place my lockbox?
I won't allow my hard-earned profits to fall into those rats' hands!
I'll never leave you, my captain...in spirit!
Please forgive me! I know not what I do!
Mayhap it's right time I thought about relocation...
I knew the captain would save us!
Now, we strike at their heart! Follow me!
To the seventh hell and back, my captain!
How could I have let this happen...?
Let me tend to your wounds.
No, let <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> tend to your wounds!
Oh, if there were only someone who loathed colibri as much as I...
There! The true enemy shows himself!
The day is ours! Now let us return to Highbridge.
Hit them hard and watch them scatter!
Look! They bend! And what bends will break!
Rip the teeth from their maws!
No one will remember your name after I'm through with you!
Zuzuroon cares not of names. Zuzuroon cares only of sparklies!
This is <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> bridge, and it is high time you left it!
Zuzuroon soon be leaving...but with flesh for sparklies!
Fall back! We are outmatched and need time to regroup!
Well, then we have no time to lose. I charge by the bell, you know.
Oh, not <var 1A 02 /var>them<var 1A 01 /var> again. You might want to draw your weapon.
Why won't they just let me be!?
Twelve forfend! They simply won't give in!
Strong must away. Lizards seek puny stock.
Qiqirn no quarrel with sword swingers. Leave now, and Qiqirn see off!
To market! To market! To sparklies! To market!
His Effulgence would have these souls!
My flame dies here, but my Lord's burns ever...bright...
Twelve forgive me, for I am weak.
Hurry, would you? We mustn't keep the monsignor waiting.
What was that? And that? And that!?
If the monsignor is without his mead for even a single turn of the sun...
Why can't the monsignor get his own mead!?
The Sanctum lies just beyond those trees.
We made it! Oh, praise the Twelve!
I will repay you one day, my friend. Just...not with mead.
When we're through, I want to be waist-deep in little white mandragora limbs!
The hells-spawned thing bit me leg!
Keep it away! Keep it away!
I didn't hire you to just stand there!
The mead! You can have it! Just spare me!
Oh, kindly Matron, take me to Your ivory bosom and away from this hell!
Where is this <var 1A 02 /var>gift<var 1A 01 /var> Master Gegeruju promised?
I do not enjoy being made to wait.
Apologies, milord. I hope you did not wait overlong.
Ah, Master Gegeruju. You know me well.
There is no need to rush, milord. Thanks to the master, we have <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> night.
I won't let none have her!
Off our land, ye foul shite!
How's about some steel fer supper!?
A knife to the gut'll serve ye fine.
This'll hurt you more than it does me!
I'll drag ye down to the abyss meself!
Let me go! I'll pay double what the lizardmen are offering!
I thought I'd never see Highbridge again.
What in the blary 'ells is that!?
Grab yer steel! The mill's under attack!
Keep the damn things off the 'ampers!
Kobolds! Gut the mecky cave dogs!
First rats, then kobolds, now coeurls!? What's next? Aurochs!?
No rest fer an honest pirate, eh?
Wivout that grain, we'll starve like...rats!
There be too godsdamned many of 'em!
Go piss on some other tree!
I's killed me share o' rats o'er the years. What's a few more?
The bigger they come, the more there be to kill!
This stench! It could only be...
Qiqirn! A whole pack heads this way as we speak!
To arms, men! We must defend the tower!
That should keep them at bay for now.
But where there are ten rats, there are ten score. They'll be back.
There'll be more toads to gut tomorrow.
Now, let us back to the Wench. The first round is on the Admiral!
I can see your hearts just aren't in it.
Let us back to the Wench. A nice warm ale'll lift your spirits!
Killin' ain't no different on land than it be on the sea.
Only pirate what'll give ye quarter's a dead pirate.
Burn the bodies. We don't want 'em foulin' the water!
Today we fought! Tonight, we drink!
Start skinnin' the dead! I need somethin' to wipe me arse!
I'll see each an' every one of ye in the seventh hell!
If a pirate cannot gut a blary rat, she ain't worth 'er weight in salt.
Tell yer Titan I sends me regards!
Ye'll ne'er see naught as that on the seas, me lads!
I should've stayed on the sea.
Failures as pirates, failures as millers, failures as fighters...
They was jus' toyin' wiv us.
I'll need to seal up this wound afore it festers.
Damn this place to the seventh hell!
I've 'ad enough. A pirate needs 'er a ship, not a mecky mill.
A little rust on the sword arm...
'Aven't yet rightened me land legs, I reckon.
Ye've a whole blary mountain to muck about on. Leave us be!
O'Ghomoro is ours! All ours! Cast off, overdwellers! Cast off!
Yer neck is hanging by a thread, lad.
Titan will not suffer you on His mountain! Cast off! Cast off!
The rocks will crush you! The mountain will shun you!
Mills is fer millers. Do I look like a mecky miller!?
The Eighth Umbral Era'll be upon us afore this mill's repaired...
I'm done. Done wiv it all!
What I wouldn't give for a breath o' sweet salt air...
Now that was a thing o' beauty!
Tell me, how did it feel to whack them beasties good?
Oh, if only I were still young.
Hells, I <var 1A 02 /var>am<var 1A 01 /var> still young! Might be next time I join ye!
'Tis a shame we couldn't thwack 'em all.
But they'll be back, and I'll be waitin'.
Waitin' fer <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> to help again, that is. Gah hah hah hah!
Now it may be I can fish 'ere in peace, like.
Me leg? It'll be fine. I'll just dip 'er in the river a spell.
<pant> <pant> Our tribe was tested today, yet our strength proven once again.
You will have vengeance, my fallen sisters... I swear it!
Another hole lost to the bloody hells-spawn.
The guildmaster won't like that one bit...
Wild beasts have made these fields their home.
Now we reclaim what is rightfully ours!
But we must remain vigilant. The stubborn beasts will likely come crawling back.
I won't let that happen again.
Their eyes... Did you see their eyes?
Aye... Those men are dead, and they don't even know it.
I fear I cannot make it alone...
I pray the local levy has seen to the Westroad.
I don't remember Tidegate being so far...
I shall not disappoint the Admiral again!
Back to the hills with you!
The Maelstrom thanks you. Till sea swallows all!
Do not stray too far from me now. I fear this ankle won't hold much longer.
You don't see any more creatures do you? And lemons. What of lemons?
Ack! This is it! The end! Thal, take me!
Now to soak this ankle in a piping hot tub...
A fine day for fishin', if I do say so meself.
I'll catch somethin' big today. I can <var 1A 02 /var>feel<var 1A 01 /var> it.
What's that? Somethin's odd with the water...
When I said I might catch somethin' big, I never meant <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> big!
How am I to fish with all these damned efts about!?
I can't fish in that water, what with all them rotting eft corpses...
Might be I need to find me another hole...
What a bloody fine day for fishin'!
We shall crush our enemies and revel in their fear as they tremble before us!
Dare you defy me!? I said <var 1A 02 /var>forward<var 1A 01 /var>!
Another lash will teach you to obey!
The drakes, they would set us at naught!
Commander! The drake... It <var 1A 02 /var>relieves<var 1A 01 /var> itself on our supplies!
Rise, I say! Rise and attack!
Attack, or I'll kill you myself!
Our Lord will not be pleased...
There! Do you not see the enemy!?
Commander! These drakes! They fail us!
These would serve better as meat for our men!
This is futile. Fall back to Zanr'ak!
The Westroad's not safe this far from Limsa.
With all this danger lurking in the shadows, how do people even survive out here?
Ah hah hah hah hah! Yellowjacket humor, no doubt.
How ever will I pass with those...those...<var 1A 02 /var>things<var 1A 01 /var> standing there!
Do I wait, or do I brave the hills...?
Don't make me have to brave the hills!
Pshkoooh! Who is it that backstalks Wormwix!?
Deathwords bring slimy beasties for bumlicking!
Deathwords bring fiery beasties for bumburning!
Deathwords bring buzzing beasties for bumbiting!
Wormwix is thinking about maybe making busydeal with wideheart adventurer...
Bastard of Light! Bow down to the one true god! Bow to Dalamud!
The souls of the Lambs never sleep!
The souls of the Lambs never forgive!
The souls of the Lambs never forget!
Brothers! Sisters! Take me to your arms! Do not leave me here!
I answer only to the Lord of the Inferno!
Your soul is rotten! Let the flames purify the corruption!
Your souls cannot be saved until they have burned in the seventh hell!
Rise, my brother, and walk at my side once again!
Rise, my sister, and reclaim what was wrested from your grasp!
Rise, my father, and strike down our enemies with rage!
My kin... Soon...we shall be reunited once...again...
This one's wings shall darken the moon and bring everlasting night!
This one tires of the game!
Death to the spoken! Death to all!
You were foolish to come here alone!
Do not think you have won just yet!
You have not seen the last of me!
Know, I do, the secrets of the Land!
Hewn, we are, from rock! To dust it is we crumble! So sayeth Titan!
O Lord of Crags! The pain! The pain...!
Come! The one true god awaits your sacrifice!
O Dalamud! Baptize these wayward souls in thy crimson radiance!
Let the blood red flames burn away your sins!
Tonight, the blood price shall be paid in full!
My lord... Why hast thou forsaken...me...?
None can stand the searing heat of my flames!
Try and match my speed, pathetic smoothskin!
You have not seen the limits of my power!
The land will melt and the seas will boil!
Zezeroon's heart is filled with sadness. Supper is there, but Zezeroon's here!
Zezeroon's belly is filled with rumblings and grumblings!
Zezeroon's nose is filled with the sweet smells of meats and treats!
Zezeroon's ears are filled with the cracklings and sizzlings of supper!
Zezeroon's heart is filled with joy! Thank you, adventurer!
This one is so lost and lonely...
Where, oh where is Little Solace?
This one should never have left the camp...
This one shall never forget walking one's kindness.
Oh, what ever is a moogle to do?
I thought I said no autographs!
Why don't I simply choose not to be seen? Pah! Then what sort of celebrity would that make me?
You can all look, but absolutely no touching, kupo!
I'm still in one piece, I'll give you that, kupo. Now, where is everyone?
Are you wideheart uplander who is giving Guttrix walkpath safety?
How can treelanders stand all these squigglevines and stranglevines?
With fastness, lazyleg uplander! With fastness!
Guttrix is goodliest good gobbie goodsbearer!
Many, many thanks, uplander! Be not un-remembering your gobbiefriend Guttrix!
I assume you're from the Adventurers' Guild. Shall we be off, then?
Come now. I wouldn't want to see the crop sold to another buyer on account that I was late in arriving.
This area is a tad more...rough than I imagined.
How can anyone survive the night, let alone run an entire farm with all these terrible creatures about!?
That was...thrilling, to say the least. Here's to hoping they deliver.
Kind adventurer keeps Memeroon safe? Come, come, then! Keep Memeroon safe, then!
Oh, please! Oh, please! Keep Memeroon's sparklies safe!
Memeroon cannot be fighting! Must keep sparklies safe!
Memeroon is safe! Sparklies are safe! Should Memeroon share sparklies...?
Guttrix seeks kindly uplander to give walkpath safety!
Guttrix makes busydeal with rainlanders. Many, many understones for purse full of jinglyshine!
We must be moving legs with much fastness! Busydeal waits in keep of candles!
Many, many thanks, uplander! Be not un-remembering your gobbiefriend Guttrix!
See me as far as upper La Noscea and I shall see <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> pockets lined with gil.
There are many an ailing soul up at the Warmwine Sanitorium who are in urgent need of this wine.
Used to be a woman could walk all the way from Bloodshore to Bronze Lake without suffering more than a blister.
I sense danger all around us!
I believe I can complete the journey on my own. You have my thanks, adventurer.
Pardon me there, adventurer. Might you know the road to Ul'dah? I seem to be...lost.
One would think a traveling merchant might have a better sense of direction.
Oh, I do hope this whole affair does not put a hamper on our shipping agreement.
You didn't happen to see aught stirring behind that cactus, did you?
A thousand thousand thanks, adventurer. I shall give the Caravans your regards.
Guttrix makes no wrongdoing! Guttrix is no bad gobbie!
Guttrix wants only busydeal with scalytails for much jinglyshine!
Lustyeye beasties seek munchings and crunchings!
Many, many thanks, uplander! But Guttrix will be back for more busydeals!
Did mah uncle send yah? He's always worrying.
I jus' wanted to see mah ma an' da.
Ma an' Da are watching. That's what mah uncle says, but I never see 'em.
Mah uncle says one day, I'll be strong as mah da.
I'll make sure to whet me cutlass for next time.
Now! We must move before they return.
Yer coin...or yer life. Choose quickly, afore I takes me both!
You'd best do as he says.
Our work here is complete. Now back to the custom house with these crates.
The conditions do not appear optimal for a raid. We shall take what we have and return for the rest another time.
What in the seven hells got into them?
Retreating from sheep... Now I'll never make sergeant...
Cease with this nonsense at once or both yer arses'll be rottin' in the brig!
If ye put it that way...
Ain't no woman worth pissin' in a bucket fer, I reckon.
Would you two listen!? She loves neither of you!
Well, then I'll jus' 'ave to make 'er!
Tryptix wishes no busydeal! Tryptix takes uplander jinglyshine!
Uplander filling with heartthumps as beauteous fighty-tool swishes and swooshes!
Cheers. Ever think of workin' as a heavy?
I told you to never come back!
Sod off, shite-breath! The ale's sourin'.
I have no qualms with killin' me a rat.
Ale and wine! Wine and ale!
Qiqirn smells no like rat. Qiqirn smells like Qiqirn!
Qiqirn hates blood. Qiqirn loves wine!
Those rats'll think twice afore showin' their ugly mugs 'round here again soon.
I'd offer you a drink on the house. But it ain't my house, so my thanks'll have to serve.
Now I think I'll have that bonny wench see to me hurts. Heh heh heh.
They don't pay me enough for this...
I needs me a stiff drink.
More sparklies for you, more ale for Qiqirn!
Qiqirn drinks whole cask and wears on head!
Ale for Guguroon! Ale for all!
You're soft! Soft like a baby's arse!
Going to let some adventurer shame you like that, eh!?
My wounds! Someone see to my wounds!
Cap'n is strong! Cap'n is strong! Squawk!
Batten down the hatches! Batten down the hatches! Squawk!
Maybe now I can finally get some work done.
What work is that, you ask?
Why, pullin' weeds, of course! Ones that don't bite back, mind you.
The damned things are like weeds.
I suppose there's no escapin' them.
Best I return to the fields and assess the damage.
I reckon I have a lot of replantin' to do.
Watch your footing, lest the sand drag you under.
I didn't want it to come to this!
Well, don't jus' stand there, ye dogs!
Get yer heads out of yer arses and heal me wounds!
Ye can have the ruddy turtle!
Urth... One day, I <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> find thee...
Who is it that would deny me passage?
Here I stand─a god amongst men. Yet here I remain─a mere man amongst gods.
Mine obsidian blade shalt split atwain the threads of thy future...
...whilst its crimson fuller shalt channel the lifeblood of thy past!
Thou knowest not thy folly. Forfeit is thy waking soul...
The sea'll wait. She always does.
The mill needs mendin'. We need concern ourselves with naught more.
It may take these legs a few more summers to get used to the land.
One day, I'll be back on the Blue. I swear it.
As much to be had on land, as there be on the sea, I reckon.
'Tis time we learned to be lubbers.
Danger in these woods. Lots of scaries scares the sparklies.
Open for trade! Trade for sparklies!
Conjurer, I cannot stand much longer!
Not a single wolf shall pass on my watch!
You will not have our camp!
Sound the alarum! The enemy draws nigh!
The knights of House Durendaire will never break!
The feast is about to begin...and your minds are the main course!
Dance for me, slave of stone!
Another dance, my slave! The dance of death!
Now from the depths of the seven hells will terror rise!
Open the gates, my lord, and send your minions through!
Heed me, servants of the Hound! Your place is in this realm!
You cannot stop what has already begun!
The children of the wood are no match for the denizens of the dark!
Dalamud will lap at your lifeblood and grow ever stronger!
The corruption is worse than I expected...
I have time to do naught but defend...
This corruption must be sluiced clean.
Ready your blades! We meet the gigas on the field!
The site is ours! Back with you to your mountains of cold!
I never met a beast I couldn't eat! And tonight it looks like a feast!
Gah hah! Start the fires! I'll ready the meat!
I can feel it! The strength of nature flows through me!
Are you here to guide me back to camp? Splendid!
I apologize. I was examining that amazing formation.
None of those pesky gigas up ahead, are there?
You are certain this route is safe?
Ah, back at the camp. And just in time for treacle tart!
Rise from the void! I summon thee! Squaaaaaark!
I AM MIMAS! MIMAS CRUSH YOU!
Tracking me to the ends of the realm... You truly are naught but the archbishop's hounds.
Descend on these pawns, my friends!
Come to me, O ye of ancient blood!
Beware... My death...will only serve to stir others...
MY PEOPLE CLIMB TOWER AND RETURN TO HEAVENS!
MY PET SUCKS MARROW FROM YOUR BONES!
THEY ARE NOT ALL WHO HEED MY CALL!
YOU ARE STRONG, BUT WE ARE STRONGER!
These things are as soft as yer mum's arse!
It's like slaughtering pigs in a pen! Ugly green pigs, mind ye.
K-K-Keep away from me, you monster!
Hear the screams of my fallen brothers!
I will repay this debt, good adventurer!
Now, we must make haste. The wolves are not but a few yalms back.
We must show them our strength, or the pack will continue their pursuit!
Back to the wood with you, kwaaark!
Can you bear the wind, smoothskin!?
Squark! This is no place for you! Leave at once!
I shall teach you to fly! Straight into the chasm!
Something not of this world walks the sands. It must be stopped!
We can only pray there are no more...
The flames of our Lord cleanse us of our sins.
Tempered in fire, our hearts grow harder!
Let the holy flames engulf you!
Halt! Do not think we won't strike you in the back!
The punishment for your insolence will be swift!
Witness the power of the undying flame!
The taste of victory is always bitter when fouled by Ul'dahn blood.
It's as if a mountain has come to life!
If I never see a living mountain again, it will be too soon!
Know what we do is for your own good and the good of the realm!
PUNY SONS OF MAN! RUN WHILE YOU CAN!
Hark! 'Tis the sound of their steps as they approach!
Gods... There must be hundreds of them...
Silence! Are you a craven or are you a knight of House Haillenarte!?
Better to be a live coward than a dead...anything!
A fine display! If only those who ran could have witnessed your bravery!
Damnation! Fall back to Camp Dragonhead!
Lock your doors! Batten your windows!
The goobbues are coming! The goobbues are coming!
They are too much for us! To the Locks! We shall regroup there!
Your tempering will come soon enough, mortals!
I say, are there none who would escort me?
Stay alert, my friend. The gigas in these parts have no love for our kind.
Would you look at this! A remarkable specimen!
Can you see how the crystal resonates with the sound of our footsteps?
Simply marvelous! I must have a closer look!
The Sons back at the camp will not believe this!
It was a miracle that we met with nary a single setback.
I suppose I have you to thank for that!
Nothing! The howling has finally subsided!
I will live to see another sunrise. My thanks to you, adventurer!
Any closer and we'll be eaten alive!
But these sacks must be delivered! What can I do?
They're gone! I can complete my delivery!
I don't know how to thank you! Oh, wait! Gil!
Another day lost. My employer will take this directly from my pay...
Giant's foot, my rosy red arse!
We did the best we could...
Might be I can reason with them. I studied giant at the scholasticate and am fluent in four dialects.
You won't mind if we stay back a few paces...just in case.
Holler if you need my help with the dialects!
I must admit, those who say the pen is mightier than the sword...
I still think we could have reasoned with them...
...though, they did not appear to respond to any of the dialects...
This is not over, you hear me!?
I knew we should have just gone back to the Front.
You see. You should have let me reason with them! Four dialects, I said! Four!
Enemy at the Gates! Secure the portcullis!
How many sailors are on this ship!?
I have this front in hand!
Stand clear, unless you fancy a trampling!
Do not let them gain the shore!
Gather the wounded. We make for the Observatorium immediately.
Gather the wounded and fall back to the Observatorium!
Look! The spirit of Saint Daniffen!
O Wrathful Fury in heavens on high! Pray give me strength to overcome the evils of this world.
Figures to be a cold one, today. 'Twas a cold one yesterday, too.
And I would guess them's the reason why!
Ice sprites! Push them back from the Cloak!
Mamool Ja bandits spotted out beyond the rise!
Drop weapons and gil, you live!
We'll find ye one day. And when we do, it's to the brig with ye!
Mamool Ja no run. Mamool Ja <var 1A 02 /var>plan<var 1A 01 /var>.
Sound the bell! The Sahagin approach!
Hah hah! Till sea swallows all!
We have what we came for. Back to the shhhea!
You shhhall drown in your own blood!
This wall is ours! Remember that, fishbacks!
The bell! The bell! Fishbacks march from the south!
The Puller will be pleased. Back to the shhhea!
Fear not the breathers of air!
To the bottom of the abyshhh with you all!
This wall has stood for five summers unbreached, and it shall stand another five hundred!
They have shhhilenced the Puller! Back to the shhhea!
Throw off yer armor and I might just let ye live...long enough to see me don it.
Me blade will cut yer flesh like the sea.
Ye should 'ave run while ye 'ad the chance!
Who do ye think ye is, comin' in <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> lair, lookin' to quarrel?
Skippers! A whole damned plague of 'em, to boot!
Let the scavengers clean up the mess.
Protect the pickman! Protect the mines!
The ores are ours! Ours are the ores!
The ores are mine! Mine are the ores!
Send the greedy overdwellers over the cliff! Over the cliff!
Bury the greedy overdwellers under the rocks! Under the rocks!
Grenades on the planks! Hide the firesand! Ready the pikes!
That should do us for now, but I want a man on the planks day and night.
Somethin' ain't right with them raptors...
What ever it was put them raptors in a frenzy's still up there...
Why must you just sit there like some...some...toad!?
Then it is settled! Slay away!
Did you hear that, you slimy beast!? You're through!
We are unlike our brethren. You will not be shown the mercy of tempering!
The Gore Horde! The Amalj'aa elite!
They will torture and kill any they find, whether he be man or child!
The heads of your fallen will be presented as a gift to our Lord!
Let the flames of the present～♪
Fear not the frigid hands of death...
...for the flames have foretold our victory!
We did it! Here's the forty-eight percent, as promised.
Fifty-one, you say? Are you certain?
Alright, alright. Let's make it forty-nine and a half and call the deal square! Ta-ta!
Not only couldn't you do away with the toads, but you managed to trample up the entire camp!
There's naught left to claim, could I claim it! Another abandoned leve, I'm afraid...
Gah hah hah! I'm the best!
Say my name, brothers! Say. My. Name!
Ah, an adventurer! Lend an engineer a hand, would you?
I could have used a few more round pegs, but such is life!
I'm not staying here any longer. Who knows when the imperials will be back for their machine?
Look behind you! A three-headed goobbue!
Fall in behind the pilus prior!
Eorzea will not be yours for long!
I'll show you why the 3rd Cohort is most feared in the legion!
The young ones must not fall into dark hands!
This one's heart is filled with wrath!
Spoken ones must leave at once!
Good adventurer! A great dragon approaches!
Svara will not wait for us. Come!
Have your weapon ready. It is not a question of if the Horde finds us, but when.
If only Bertha were here. She'd rip a hole right through 'em!
Hurry. The Steel Vigil is not far.
Thank you! But my work today has only just begun.
It appears we have made it with all our limbs still attached.
The gigas are naught but cowards.
They wouldn't hesitate to attack an unguarded caravan, but place a few blades at the van and─
You might want to wait before completing that thought.
Th-Th-They don't look all that cowardly from here!
Shields together! Form a wall around the findings!
Not even time for a piss, eh?
In most circumstances, I would commend you on your bravery and send you on your way.
...but these documents aren't going to carry themselves to the camp.
Seems the gigas had a bit more fight in them than I thought.
Not <var 1A 02 /var>enough<var 1A 01 /var> fight is how I see it. Hah!
When you boys are done patting yourselves on the back, we've still got work to do.
They were...irreplaceable! A lifetime of knowledge...gone!
What am I to tell the Sons!?
We're lucky to have made it out with our hearts still beating.
That doesn't make the taste any less bitter.
That will teach you to underestimate your enemy, fools.
This hammer will not hold them back for long!
Try and keep the dragons from nippin' our arses.
Once Bertha here is hale and hearty, we'll show them dragons what for!
Keep one eye on the sky, and the other on the ground. Not all the Horde have wings!
I need more time. Bertha's a fickle lass.
No more of this for me! I'm back to the Locks!
Ol' Bertha's standing once again! Now where's that dragon!?
Isn't there anyone who can help me?
We must move these logs to the library for proper cataloging.
Oh, dear. Not here... Not now!
I'll slice your throat and kick you from Witchdrop!
Water sprites! How in the Fury's name will I fill my phials!?
Enough of this place. A warm hearth awaits me back beyond the Gates of Judgement.
My client will be...disappointed, to say the least.
I pray Haldrath's March is clear.
We must hurry. The archbishop is not one to be made to wait.
These astroscope readings could change the outcome of the war. They cannot be lost!
I can see the aetheryte's glow. We are almost arrived!
My thanks, adventurer. You were more than a capable escort.
Now I must be off to find that courier. Good day!
What in the world is that thing!?
Good gracious! Look at the size of that maw!
The findings! I must protect them!
Where did these things come from!? They weren't here a bell ago!
They're making for the camp! Someone <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> something!
Hapalits!? You look as if you could use some help!
At least we were able to force them back...
Those Mamool Ja wear the sign of the Crag! Their loyalty has been bought by the kobolds!
This road cannot fall into beastman hands!
Drive the sellswords to the seventh hell!
As long as their pockets are lined, they'll be back.
Fall back and inform the camp that the road is compromised!
This road now kobold road. Pay in gil or pay in blood!
Too many blades. Not enough coin promised.
The Climb is safe...for the moment.
These puppets cannot be contained! We must fall back and regroup!
The area ahead is under kobold control.
The beastmen <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> make an attempt at our supplies.
And we will see that they fail, sir!
It's not what I see...but what I smell...
We're out of the fire, but not clear of the kitchen. Push ahead!
We are still quite far from our destination. Stay close.
If I were any closer, you could smell the squirrel I ate this morning.
We cannot leave without that bird. He's carrying half our charge!
How's this─you two wait here with the good 'bo, and I'll look for the other?
Are you sure that's a good idea? The jungle is rife with danger.
What in the seven hells is wrong with you? You've been kwarking since we left!
That was closer than I would have liked.
That was quite the piss. Are you sufficiently relieved, then?
Bah, I'd tell you, but you wouldn't believe me anyway.
And that we can agree on.
I suppose there are worse ways to die...
You are truly a hero! If only I could find a man like you!
Not me! That one! Eat that one!
Many sparklies for Jijiroon. Jijiroon overjoyed!
Little sparklies for Jijiroon. Jijiroon drowns sorrows in pelican eggs.
La la la la la la la la la LA LA LA LA LA LA la LA la LA LA!
Bad spoken one! Bad spoken one!
Root! This one needs more root!
This one's head is spinning and spinning and spinning and...
Why can I not bathe in springs!?
I've already told you. It is forbidden.
My coin, same coin as smoothskins'!
This is not about your <var 1A 02 /var>coin<var 1A 01 /var>. It is about your <var 1A 02 /var>behavior<var 1A 01 /var>.
Mamool Ja have eyes. Eyes must see something!
And the...unsightly grinding and gyrating of your pelvic region.
Ah! Traditional Mamool Ja bathing dance!
I care not what you call it! It will not be tolerated!
I pay my coin! I dance my dance!
Leave this place and never return!
Memories only fade if there is no one to remember them...
As long as this one has life, the memory of the fallen ones will endure.
I'm afraid I cannot allow that!
Today we march on the encampment!
Whatever happens, do not break! Understood!?
Do you want to live forever!?
The Amalj'aa... They knew we were coming!
Reform the line! The encampment is ours!
Grab the wounded and fall back!
Bertha'll keep you warm, foul dragon!
Pay the lady no mind! She'll see you're well taken care of!
Die, dragons! Each and every one of you!
Did they spot us and circle around?
Hold the pass! Don't let a single one through!
Then we regroup and make pursuit!
This one's poisons consume minds! Corrupt souls!
If I am not at the plant in a bell, I will be ruined!
Splendid! Now let us hurry. There is no time to lose!
What was that!? I think I saw something move!
One cannot be too careful, you know.
Shhh! Did you hear that? No?
Wait! Now, you may think I am being overly cautious, but...
You know how the proverb goes...
It's better to be safe than strung up and gralloched by a bloodthirsty maniac!
There is something ahead... I can <var 1A 02 /var>feel<var 1A 01 /var> it!
We are not but a quarter malm from the plant but...
I... I made it in one piece! Thank the Twelve!
If only you could have gotten me here sooner!
Caution can ofttimes be a man's best friend!
You see! You see! I felt it! I <var 1A 02 /var>felt<var 1A 01 /var> it!
I have no coin! I promised it all to the adventurer! That's the one you want!
Mamool Ja is man, like all men...
Now, back to...er...seeing that these women are...uh...safe. Yes.
No man talks ill of Mamool Ja custom and lives!
You, lucky today. I come back tomorrow. I come back and dance!
I'm not paying you another man's coin to let them manhandle me!
Not the tunic! This cost me a fortune!
Stop playing around, adventurer, and get this thing off of me!
A fine spring that was! The view was simply spectacular!
How am I to get back to camp?
Oh, I cannot begin to express my gratitude!
I was in a cold sweat for the duration.
Perhaps I should go back to the spring and warm up...
What ever is a Lalafell to do?
I suppose I'll just have to return to the spring and wait.
Though, now that I think about it, another dip would be quite refreshing!
Why must you overdwellers always disturb my research!? Why!? Why!?
My next experiment will use your blood! Your blood!
The Gyve will not fall to the sons of man!
No manner of spell or steel can penetrate our wall!
You will drown in a storm of arrows!
Run! Your back will make an easy target!
The Amalj'aa are attempting a summoning! We must silence them before it's too late!
We've a hero in our midst.
This should keep the lizards quiet for a spell.
But don't think they won't be back. They always are.
If a few sand lizards cannot be stopped, then we are doomed!
You have my thanks, adventurer. Do not let our failure here discourage you.
I must be returning soon, so if you happen to have a core or five in your pocket...
The ceruleum is safe for another day! From stray vibrations, that is. A single bomb and...boom!
Not as many cores as I had hoped...
I'll just have to cross both fingers tonight, then.
It'll take me the better part of the day to move all these crates back up into Wineport...
The buccaneers! Keep them back from me wine!
It's still strewn about the ground... <sigh> But at least it's safe!
I think I needs me a drink...
Me wine... I can't bear to look!
The vintner'll have me head...if the pirates don't get it first!
What was that shattering? Was it a bottle!?
Back to the jungle with you, you dirty thieves!
Your head will look good on a pike above the hamlet gates!
And don't think of coming back!
We've failed you... Please accept our apologies.
A few more blades and we would have had them!
Looks like yer 'avin' a spot o' trouble wiv the wain!
Who says the Twelve don't smile on pirates!?
Ever 'eard o' the law o' possession!?
Why buy what ye can take!?
We'll be seein' ye again, peddler!
Leave the dead. They will only weigh us down.
To die at the hands of a beastman...
Imperial ones foul the wood with smoke and soot!
Revenge for fallen ones shall be swift!
Now that the imperial unit is no more, the remaining sylphs have drawn back into the wood.
My thanks. Without your help, I would be lying there cold with the other imperial corpses.
Your treachery will not be allowed in the Twelveswood!
I'll skin ye and throw yer bones to dogs!
Make ready, then. The buccaneers could be here at any m─
The place'll be swarmin' wiv honeybees and the Admiral's 'ounds.
I ain't never met an 'oneybee I couldn't swat, nor an 'ound I couldn't kick.
I'm goin' to drink meself a river, that's what I'm goin' to do!
Been a long while since I drunk me some real red. I've 'ad enough o' that shite Shorty makes in 'is boot.
How's this fer a plan─I'll do the cuttin', ye'll do the guttin'.
Workin' up a right thirst, what wiv all this fightin'.
Ye 'ave no right to be here!
We was just mindin' our own!
Damn the Admiral's 'ounds to the seventh 'ell!
Ye'll pay fer this! A pirate never forgets!
Damn the Admiral's hounds to the seventh hell!
There'll be no raidin' till these bloody 'urts mend.
Alright, you filthy scrags! Your plan is up!
Throw down your weapons or feel the brunt of the storm!
This is easier than jointing a pig!
When has a band of landlocked pirates ever been a match for the Maelstrom?
The louder they are, the quieter it is when they fall.
Fall back! We'll regroup at Wineport!
You haven't seen the last of us, scrags!
Just try and take the hamlet!
There's no turning back now! Go!
That's strange... Shouldn't one of their leaders be overseeing the dig?
What if this is not the main dig site?
I wonder how the other units are faring.
Pipe it down, ladies. There is still equipment to destroy!
If we can slay her, the others will fall back!
I can't believe it! We actually did it!
Who would have thought that three storm privates could defeat a kobold matriarch!?
I told you we should have waited until the main unit arrived...
I take full responsibility. Your lashes are mine.
What are you doing!? What! Are! You! Doing!?
O Lord of Crags, forgive Your lowly servant! I am not worthy! I am not worthy!
Our shiny tools! Who will mend our shiny tools!?
An eternity of pain and agony to those who harm our tools!
Do not let the overdwellers escape! We take them before Titan!
Stop the overdwellers! Stop them! Stop them! Stop them!
I do not like this one bit...
If our numbers were only greater...
If we are to attack, we must do it before reinforcements arrive.
We have the element of surprise, but...
Here, let me hand you the rei─
Shhh... Calm down, now. What do you see?
Wait! I thought your leg was─! Damned bird! Get back here or I'll roast you and eat you rare!
Now, when I get my hands on that 'bo...
I carry nothing! The 'bo has it all!
It's not me you want, it's the 'bo!
Look at me! Does it look like I have any crates of sun lemons under this tunic!?
Not the face! Not the face!
I'll see you in the seventh hell, you bloody coward!
Who said a 'bo was a man's best friend!?
Your tools, throw them down! Your weapons, throw them down!
Do not hide them from us, overdweller! We can smell them!
Does the overdweller wish to die like his friends?
The rite of sacrifice is about to begin. Mwahahahahaha!
I always find it amusing how trusting you adventurers are.
That is right. It is not I who am to be the sacrifice. It is <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>!
Are there none who would take up their blade and join us?
Hah hah hah! Then show us the stuff you're made of, adventurer!
As stubborn as a rock, and as hard as a diamond. A formidable foe, that one.
He could've had a place in my unit...if he weren't dead! Hah hah hah!
Well, now we know where the scaled bastard got his name.
But we'll be ready for him next time.
O great one! An offering of blood and bone I bring thee!
We have failed our lord again!
The day is far from over...
Dalamud will yet drink of this one's lifeblood.
For we shall see to it personally!
Hold that bank with your lives!
Where did that damn 'bo get off to?
There you are. What were you thinking, galloping off like that?
Now, to rid me of this wine...wherever this may be.
I fear the worst for our friend. Watch the bird. I will be back.
This place is unsafe. Come on.
We will wait here for our third.
Jijiroon's had enough peckings and pawings for one day!
It appears quiet, but only a fool puts his trust in silence.
Overdwellers come with food and steel! We take your steel we eat your food!
Serve the Wailers, earn some coin!
I sometimes marvel at the resourcefulness of you adventurers!
This won't nearly be enough... I'd best just toss it into the river.
Tell the lot to move their arses.
No one keeps the Lord of the Inferno waiting and lives!
You will soon be one of us, free from all worry!
If it is money you want, you can have it. Gems? I have more than you can carry! They're all yours!
I'll do anything you ask! Just free us!
I let my guard down for but a moment...but 'twas a moment too long.
Now, I must find some way to escape these bonds.
Don't tell my unit you saw me here. They'd give me no end of it!
Halt and lay down your weapons!
Let the captives free and your punishment will be lightened!
I've seen that captive before somewhere...
Not yet we aren't... Something tells me those tempered won't give up without a fight.
(My unit! Out of all the units in all the realm, why did it have to be <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> unit?)
So you can come over here and slay us like dogs?
There is no truth in the words of the untempered!
Fellow Flames! Give them no quarter!
Focus on the tempered! We'll free the rest once the dirty work is done!
Unless we kill them all first!
Calm yourselves! Keep your heads down if you want to live!
Good... My unit is none the wiser!
There may be more tempered headed this way. You'd all best make for Little Ala Mhigo.
You... I'd know those ears anywhere...
Might be I join the Flames myself!
We will rise again from the ashes!
Hah hah! Where are your Twelve now!?
Move, scum! There's no one left to save you now!
Don't forget the wounded. They are still of some use.
I will take my own life before becoming one of...one of them!
I knew there was a reason I never joined the Flames.
And my unit is none th─ Wait! Who's going to rescue me now!?
We cannot give up now! Where is my linkpearl!?
Captain, my wounds... I cannot march no further today...
That Lalafell... It was <var 1A 02 /var>him<var 1A 01 /var>, wasn't it!? That fool could have helped us!
I shall rip apart your body as Dalamud gnaws upon your soul!
Bleed! Bleed for the one true lord!
The Hound stirs with each drop spilled!
Your defense is full of holes...as soon you will be!
Did you see that? Of course you didn't!
I've got him! I've got him!
And here I thought it was the rabbits who was swift.
Seven hells to purgatory! Another one lost.
Calm yourself! We'll just find ourselves another one. Come on!
Keep your ears open and your eyes peeled.
Somethin' that large cannot hide for long.
The swarmpoint won't be pleased if we come home with empty hands.
I can't see a godsdamned thing!
I'll see you cut from ear to ear!
You just wait until we get us a turtle!
You'd best hope our paths don't cross again!
Luck was on your side today, outsider, but we'll see about the morrow!
Sleep with one eye open tonight, 'venturer. I'll be comin' for you!
Damned outsider went and frightened off all the damned turtles!
I ain't tellin' the swarmpoint. You tellin' the swarmpoint?
I can't even remember what we was lookin' for...
I ain't tellin' the swarmpoint. You tellin' the swarmpoint?
I know a place deeper in the wood. Might be we find us a big one there.
What we need is more Redbellies. Let's go back to the Hive.
My blood and soul, I give unto thee!
Ah hah hah! Foolish mortal! I know not of this Dalamud, but if he will not partake in this offering, I claim it as my own!
Then we shall return on the morrow.
It is! The bane of the elder one lives!
The tusked one must answer for crimes against the elder one!
This one cannot forgive! This one cannot forget!
O elder one! Give this one the strength to exact vengeance!
Yet, why does the heart of this one still feel so empty...?
Vengeance still burns in this one's heart!
Me poor back cannot take another lashin'.
I'm but a porter. My talents are limited to porting...and little else.
I thank you...and my wife thanks you. Or at least she will after tonight! <wink>
Perhaps I can make it back to an inn...
You wait. The wine'll be sweet this season!
<sigh> Mayhap the morrow'll bring better luck.
The golems have the road. We must take it back!
The stone man wakes! The stone man walks!
Save us! Save us from the stone man! Save us!
Back to the mines! Back to the dig!
No more digging! Much more running!
Titan, save us! Adventurer, save us!
Pshhh! Shhhend the finleshhh ones below!
O Leviathan! Lend us Your strength!
Leviathan is the one true god!
Gods! There are so many of them!
Grenades! They're too close to the plant!
Close the blast doors! Turn off the pumps!
There's just no end to these damned things.
I will not be defeated. Not here! Not by the likes of you!
We have made it this far...
...but our work has only just begun!
And what work is that, sir!?
The work we came here for!
Gah! To the hells with it! You know what to do!
I would not believe it if I had not seen it with mine own eyes.
Hah hah! I was made for this!
One-eyed demons to the north! To arms!
Don't forget to strip the eyes of the lenses. The Alchemists' Guild'll pay good coin for 'em!
Is there no end to these doblyns!?
If I had a gil for every doblyn I'd slain...I wouldn't be here slaying cursed doblyns!
I will fight the sylphs in a location of mine own choosing!
There is no recourse. We must fight!
I'll show you what it means to wail!
The rancor! It feeds me, yet consumes me!
Sylphs approaching quickly! Where are my reinforcements!?
Imperials in the Twelveswood! I must report back to the Adders' Nest at once!
Is this my fate? To fight an endless war?
So be it. It won't be the first time I've spit in destiny's eye.
I'll cut you down to size!
Hm? Why can't I─ Well, this is just great...
You okay? That was some fight, huh? The name's Lightning. I'm not...from around here.
I'm not even sure where “here” is. The last thing I remember, I was sleeping.
I don't know if I'm stuck in this world, or if I'll be sent somewhere else...
What manner of fiend is that!?
We'll try to hold it here!
Don't let it come near the city!
Disengage! You're no match for that thing!
You can't fight an armored unit without artillery!
...Well, you get full points for bravery.
Let's see if I can't help turn the tables.
You Eorzeans don't give up, do you?
What's a militarized behemoth even doing here? Did it stumble through some portal?
Or was it sent after me?
No! I'm not done with you yet! Dammit...
Strange... I didn't expect to be here after the battle was done.
Might as well take a look around, then.
She can't defeat that abomination alone!
I have to stop meeting people like this. I'm afraid my company's going to get someone killed.
I'm beginning to understand the reason I was sent to this place: I'm being tested.
Someone woke me up to see how much fight I had left...
They want to drag me back to an ancient, dying world and chain me to a god's will.
Come on! Take me if you can! I will not be a slave!
Where is this chaos energy coming from? I thought we cut off the source, but it seems to be getting stronger...
If this keeps up, it will overflow into Eorzea.
This deity will stop at nothing to bring me back.
Even if it means corrupting your world with chaos.
Well, I've seen enough innocents die at the hands of indifferent gods!
With any luck, that'll be the last of them.
I don't think we won. Feels more like we were judged...unworthy.
Don't let them hurt me, kupo!
I'm not finished with you yet, kupo!
Yer gonna get it! Right in the bum, kupo!
Ack! Right in me bum, kupo...
Ye can run, but ye can't kupo!
You're in big trouble now, kupo!
I think I need to lie down, kupo...
Bear witness to the glory of kupo!
What to do, what to do...
Ever dance with a moogle in the pale moonlight?
Hmph! Next time won't be so easy!
Next next time won't be so easy!
You're in for a treat, kupo!
Wait, we're doing this now, kupo?
It'll all be over soon, kupo...
Hail to the kupo─I mean, king!
You are neither a gentleman nor a zombie!
Begone, villain! Leave the Gentle Dead Men in peace!
The pistol is mightier than the sword!
Rend the enemy to shreds, we shall!
Bad men come! Bad men steal! Bad men die, die, diiiiiiiiie!
All come! All kill! Kill, kill, kiiiiiiiiill!
Byregot's beard! Come to help us fight the giants, have ye?
Now let's show these buggers that size don't mean shite!
Momodi! I won't die until I see yer face once more!
All in a day's work, eh? Now back to the Quicksand, and the first round's on me!
We live to mine another day!
I can't take much more of this...
Nobody told me there would be giants...
A giant golem! Run for your lives!
Much to your chagrin, the experiment shall now begin! O～hohohohoho!
My minion has fallen? Consider me floored. Oh well, back to the drawing board.
I've collected valuable data from all this fighting. Armed with this knowledge, I shall begin my smiting!
Well, what have we here? You're not half as helpless as you appear.
While I'd like nothing more than to stick around and play, I fear I've more important matters to attend to today.
After all, I've experiments to conduct, and golems to build. But we'll meet again...if you can avoid getting yourself killed.
Oh dear, is it already this time of day? I really must be on my way.
Next time we find ourselves warring, do try to be a little less...boring.
Death by stomping, or death by curse? You decide which one is worse!
You can run, I won't make fun!
<yawn> Could you put up more of a fight? I'm about to call it a night...
That wasn't wise... Prepare for a quick demise!
I... I thought I was surely dead.
I owe you my life, adventurer.
Thank the Twelve that you arrived when you did.
I can fight no further. Forgive me...
I am blessed by the almighty Ifrit!
I hear the feeble sputtering of your spirit's flames!
Ah, she purrs like a cat!
Hmph, just a bunch of floating cabbages!
Thou shalt pay dearly for thine intrusion!
Thy kind are not welcome here!
Hope to prevail, featherless ones cannot!
Garuda's leal servant, you shall become!
No one interrupts the coming of the Lord of Crags!
Your bones will adorn Titan's earthen domain!
Pshhh... Finleshhh ones will not leave this place alive!
Begone as foam upon the waves!
Your shhhouls shall be given to the abyshhh!
My sisters will be sick with worry.
The Springs are not far now...
Voco, prince of chocobos, at your service!
We have a Chosen One to save!
Not so fast, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>! Voco's legs tire!
Voco is a brave bird, oh yes!
Your Grace, we beseech you! Save us in our hour of need, kupo!
This'll put some spring into your step!
Your Grace, your Mogglesguard is nearly undone! Save us, kupo! Save us!
You brought this on yourself, kupo!
You should never have come here, kupo!
Do you bite, little desert fly?
My fists are blessed by flame!
We are the masters of Thanalan!
The podling belongs to these ones!
Enemy of boss one is enemy of these ones.
Meddling ones' bones will litter the forest!
Tee hee! So much fun to kill walking ones!
Boss one! This one sees dead ones!
Look upon this one, and fear!
Chosen One belongs with this one!
Meddling ones will not leave this place alive!
Tee hee! Tee hee hee hee hee...hic!
Ooh, a walky one. Got milkroot, walky one?
Pshhh! Cower before the raging sea!
You brought this on yourself, kupo!
You're not getting away this time, kupo!
Ey? What's the fuss─ the trouble, the matter, the fuss?
Zo Ga wants these tunnels clean, and what Zo Ga says, goes.
Ye'll not leave these tunnels alive.
The enemy of Zo Ga is my enemy.
I'll bore a hole in yer bloody chest.
Muahaha! How do you like that!?
Shkoh! Shkoh! Brayflox needs lenthand of uplander!
Stop Illuminati from dirty-taking stinkysweet cheese!
Shkoh! Brayflox is forgetting busydeal! Uplander must go alone!
Shkoh! Two more of gobbieflock needing lenthand!
Shkoh... Illuminati strike with fastness, destroy muchly!
Shkoh! No more nice gobbie! Brayflox backpays Illuminati muchly!
Cheese is gobbie birthright! Knowings of cheesemake bring much jinglyshine!
Shkohhh! Illuminati will not have cheese!
Your faith means nothing─ mine, everything!
You have been blind─ but now you shall see!
Blood and thunder? Blood and fire!
Kurhhhr! A slave of the wroth one!
A worm! A worm to pluck from an apple!
Rrrgggl! To fear me is to love me!
An army of slaves and fanatics!
Wavekin sighted! To me, to me!
In fighting is honor, and in death, glory!
If this is my death, I like the cut of it!
Blessed be Halone, Her wrath my mother's milk...
None shall stand against the knights of Ishgard!
They fall, they fall, but we─we are forever!
Hold! I say hold this posi...
May their love last for all time!
Move, you laggards! Move, I said!
Rest when you've earned it, here or in the heavens!
Get that cannon sponged! You, ready on the vent!
Ice of darkness, freeze mine enemies!
Blaze of darkness, scorch mine enemies!
Lightning of darkness, smite mine enemies!
Come thee forth, staff of eld!
Behold the marvels of Allagan science!
Is it just me, or is it a mite chilly in here?
You are as insects to be crushed underfoot!
Intruders! To arms, to arms! Squawk!
Sic 'em, you lot! Sic 'em, you lot! Squawk!
Get the cap'n! Get the cap'n! Squawk!
Work, slaves, work! No rest for you!
We'll be a few steps ahead of you!
“Run away, run away!” Ahahaha, green ones funny!
Magicks of standard give us strength!
This great source of Mamool Ja's might!
Here, this way will be faster!
Kick the Silverscales out of our home!
<var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> must not harm the Lady!
Rend asunder with fang and claw...
One of us! One of us!
Don't look at me! Don't look at meee!
What? Why you stop Mamool Ja fun!?
Mamool Ja kill you, and dance on bones!
Arrows of frost to keep my enemies at bay!
A blade of ice to defend my brothers!
The cycle ends here and now!
A shower of ice to rend flesh and bone!
The parade will soon commence. Are you suitably frightening and festive in form?
If not, ask the unusual illusionist yonder for assistance.
Cast the Festal Cant charm upon the citizens, but avoid the thaumaturges who are in the crowd.
The people are waiting. Let us march.
Shower the citizens with the Festal Cant charm.
Here the parade ends. Well done.
For good measure, let me see you cast the charm one last time.
Heh heh heh... That was fun, was it not?
A charm for happiness and fortune? I gotta get me some of that!
Ooh, I love me a good costume parade!
I want that charm all over me! Give it to <var 1A 02 /var>meee<var 1A 01 /var>!
I haven't had this much fun in ages!
What you cannot see <var 1A 02 /var>can<var 1A 01 /var> hurt you!
A fight, is it? Glad to oblige!
Come one, come all, and join the Spectral Parade.
March along the avenue, we shall, in forms frightening and festive.
A magical time is guaranteed to be had by all.
Speak with the unusual illusionist yonder, and he will weave for you a new form.
Thaumaturges will try to ruin our fun. Be wary of them.
It's the choppin' block for you!
Yer code don't mean shite to me!
Now, show me what you have learned.
This is the Katon of a true master!
You show promise. A shame you will not live to fulfill it...
Gahaha! <var 1A 02 /var>This<var 1A 01 /var> is the lesson I should have taught you long ago!
The weak shall feed the strong...
I am afraid the parade has come to an end.
Thank you for helping to spread the joy. Heh heh heh...
Take a look at this jewel, boys! It's the size of me fist!
That's amazin', boss! We're gonna be rollin' in it!
Alright, we got what we came for. Let's get out of here!
No, really! This is our last battle! Honest!
Mr. Typhon and I are friends forever!
I know what you're thinking... “Man, that was cheap!” Sorry, so sorry!
Mr. Typhon's not so great with words, but his strength'll blow you away!
Thought you had me? I've got more lives than I do arms!
Too clingy for ya? Whaddaya expect!? I'm an octopus!
I gots a little surprise for y'all. It'll be TONS of fun!
Is this the end for Uncle Ulty!?
Now kids, I hate to ink and run, but─urk...
Oi! You ain't meant to be 'ere!
Yer in for it now, mate!
No, Mr. Typhon! Say it ain't so!
Alright, Mr. Typhon! Time to make 'em fly! Hands off Mr. Typhon, kids! Don't touch Mr. Typhon!
To accelerate, press and hold the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Move Forward<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> key.
Note that your chocobo's stamina will decrease more quickly when accelerating.
Be warned─chocobos pushed too hard will become <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>lathered<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and lose stamina even more quickly!
Scattered throughout the course are <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>magicked panels<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> which bestow various effects when triggered.
Your chocobo gained a temporary burst of speed! However, be warned: not all panels bestow beneficial effects!
In addition to magicked panels, you may come across treasure coffers containing <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>race items<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
Race items will be added to your hotbar automatically, and can be used to help yourself or hinder your opponents.
Watch carefully and make the routine your own!
If you are uncertain as to how to perform, might I suggest pairing with another <var 09 E948 ((Hyuran)) ((Elezen)) ((Lalafell)) ((Miqo'te)) ((Roegadyn)) ((Au Ra)) ((Hrothgar)) ((Viera)) /var>?
Allow the motions to flow from your very heart and soul.
Empty your mind of all thoughts and embrace the routine.
This is it, my friend. Your big chance! There is no right or wrong. Only dance or dance not!
The next verse calls us! Is your heart ready to answer?
We are halfway to our goal! There is no turning back now!
We approach the climax. Do not let your limbs fall limp just yet!
Let us take a measure of your soul!
How much are you worth, I wonder?
<var 60 0234 /var>Welcome, ladies and gentlemen! Thank you for joining us for this drawing of the Jumbo Cactpot.
Now, without further ado, let us set the wheels in motion!
And the winning number for draw <var 20 E802 /var> is... <var 50 E80305 /var>!
Whether or not you hit the Cactpot today, just remember: there's always drawing number <var 20 E802 /var> to look forward to!
Here you can practice the basics of chocobo racing.
Continue to accelerate and observe the effects. Once your chocobo's stamina is completely depleted, your speed will drop, and you will no longer be able to accelerate.
To alleviate this condition, press the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Move Back<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> key to decelerate and allow your chocobo to rest.

Press the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Move Left<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Move Right<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> keys to steer your chocobo from one side of the course to the other.
To trigger a magicked panel, steer your chocobo towards it.
In addition to steering away from panels, you can also <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>jump<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to avoid them.
Some treasure coffers will be suspended in midair, so to obtain the race items within, you will need to jump.
This concludes the chocobo racing training course.
You may repeat this course at any time should you wish to review the fundamentals.
First, tilt the left stick up, or press <var 1E 0D /var> key to accelerate.
To alleviate this condition, tilt the left stick down to decelerate and allow your chocobo to rest.
Tilt the left stick to the left and right to steer your chocobo from one side of the course to the other.
All race chocobos will carry their rider to the end of a course. However, only a skilled jockey can guide his steed to victory.
The rancor will trouble us no more.
I weary of this plodding pace!
I shall turn the very ground against you!
This should cut you down to size!
Not the <var 1A 02 /var>strongest<var 1A 01 /var> of swords, but it should suffice.
Gilgamesh is in the mood...for dancing!
What's the matter, friend? All tied up?
Triple Triad is played by placing cards on a three-by-three grid. The player to act first is decided at random.
Now it's your turn! Place a card in one of the empty spaces adjacent to my card.
See how my card changed color? This means you have “captured” the card.
Try to capture and control more cards than your opponent! The match will end when all spaces on the grid have been filled.
And the match is over! Whoever controls the most cards at the end of the game is the winner!

That should put you in your place. Let 'em have it, Master Typhon!

Uh-oh! Someone just woke the dragon...
Parting is such sweet sorrow, but the finale is upon you!
Never, never again! This I do solemnly swear...
A dancer's eyes are as important as her feet! Drink in the routine as if it were the last cup of water in an endless desert!
Master Typhon is taking a well-deserved rest. Wait on stage until he's ready for you.

<var 60 0130 /var>Everyone makes mistakes, but only fools make them twice. To the next verse!
It has been a pleasure, my friend. I look forward to our next performance together!
Keep them eyes open! Any o' these gits could 'ave the vase!
I'll rip that vase from yer cold hooks if I 'ave to!

I'll go first this time to show you how it's done. I'll also extend the turn limit so you have plenty of time to think!
The numbers you can see each correspond to one side of the card. Try choosing a card with a bigger number than mine on the adjacent side!
During your turn, even if you play a card with a smaller number, it will not result in that card being captured.
A variety of rules exist that change how the game is played, but let's start you off with an easy one─All Open! This rule allows you to see all of your opponent's cards.
Stand your ground! The Fury is with thee!
Gah! It is far from over!
Let us see how you handle this!
I will not yield to you!
Well, time is on our side.
How shall you fare against this, I wonder?
O Ascalon! Partake of the Eye's power!
Let us settle this once and for all!
For the glory of King Thordan!
I will turn you into ash!
Feel the power of the dragoon!
Be frozen to your very souls!
All are fodder for the colony!
