Mine obsidian blade shalt split atwain the threads of thy future...
...whilst its crimson fuller shalt channel the lifeblood of thy past!
Goodness gracious! I, uh, just remembered something!
Urgh! I won't go down so easily!
You! Bring us some meat for the journey home!
I was wondering when you'd show your faces!
I should not have had that second ale.
Please... Do not let me die here...
I'll see you...in the seventh hell!
We cannot wait for stragglers! File in!
Essence of life, smite mine enemy!
I-I know how to use this!
You fool! You led them right to us!
Keep your filthy hands off me!
Behold the might of dragon blood!
O crimson elixir of life... Bequeath unto me thy power!
S-Ser Charibert, what are you doing!?
My lord, you must restrain yourself!
What is this that courses through my veins?
I shall fend off their steel!
I've never felt so full of vim!
Their lives belong to Lord Ifrit!
We loot loots fair and square!
All loots belong to great Yoyoroon!
A woman in black? What's wrong with the woman standin' afore ye?
I might've seen me a lass scurryin' off to the Hyaline.
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We must save Lady Leveva!
You have to even ask, Quimperain!?
Good lu～ck! (You're going to need it!)
My wings are tired and my pom heavy, kupo...
But I don't want to be <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((supper)) ((breakfast)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((lunch)) ((supper)) /var>)) /var>, kupo!
You don't want to eat <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>, kupo! I'm all gristle!
I can hear their bellies grumbling from here, kupo!
It's time we taught you a lesson, Mogoosh!
Oh yeah? You and what army, kupo!?
Uh...the one hiding behind those bushes, kupo!
Uh...the ones hidden behind those rocks, kupo!
Well, come out then and teach away, kupo!
You mustn't always think of yourself, kupo!
You are a moogle of Mog- home! Act like one, kupo!
A few nuts up the nose of a skylord never hurt anyone!
Moogles should be free to do as we please, kupo!
I hope you've learned your lesson, kupo!
Try anything again, and next time it's your pom, kupo!
How's a mog supposed to have any fun around here...
One of these days you'll get your just deserts, kupo!
Yer serious about this, ain't ye?
Where, oh where has my little mog gone?♪
Could they be coming from that thing's belly?
There's nothing in here but a bunch of bones and fur! Where could my friend be?
That's odd... The kupos have stopped...kupo.
Must find new boomydoom for uplander headbreaking!
What do you mean, “Not this one again”?
I thought I was being quite clear.
Are you being smart with me, kupo?
Now move, before I really get angry, kupo!
I guess I'll go around, kupo...
Bested by a moogle... My father will not be pleased.
Feel free to yield at any time, kupo!
Must we do this <var 1A 02 /var>every<var 1A 01 /var> day, moogle?
Don't you have some kupo nuts to gather?
You must help us protect Moghome, kupo!
Where did they come from? There is no sea in the clouds, but the Sea of Clouds!
I'm so frightened, I cannot look, kupo!
Moghome will reek of fish and kelp, kupo!
I must warn the others, kupo!
Twinkle, twinkle, little coin I need more, so come and join... ......me♪
The others will be white with envy when they see my new necklace, kupo!
The twinkling is all around us, kupo!
Yes, yes... Drink of the abyss...
But a sliver... Not too much...
I'm not going to make it, ribbit...
A thousand thanks, ribbit! A thousand and one!
Maro feels hungry eyes fixed on her plump legs...
I don't see why Mistress Matoya cannot simply send her brooms.
You don't really think the mistress would throw me in the cauldron...do you!?
Shkohhh... Slicktrix must be telling shirefriends!
Commence backwalking or boom goes the uplander!
Backwalk now or downwalk into deathpit!
Lay down your weapons and the old man lives!
No whizzlepops here! Backturn your uplander front!
Why is uplander sneak- rifling gobbiehome?
Might vangobs be requiring more board-drawing?
Vangobs generating much bounciness. Not good for bad gobbieback!
Hah hah hah! Illuminati joyshouts echo through land!
Gobbiehead is dealt much overhurt... Backfall!
Ring the loudbells! Hide the whizzlepops!
Never before have I seen the wolves in such a frenzy!
It is time we made our last stand. Are you with us?
Gut them like the curs they are!
This one would make a fine gambison!
House Durendaire could use more knights like you.
We must make it to the garrison!
I don't think I can run any further...
I'll try and draw them away!
If Illuminati cannot have whizzlepops, no gob will!
No backsnatch this time! Only blastydoom!
All your whizzlepops are belong to us!
You are no match for Illuminati!
All who backfight will die muchly!
Ironfist of Moundrinx turns you into bittybits!
It has been an honor to fight alongside one so brave.
We were fools to even come to this place!
Ten summers I've served and not a blemish...
Let us see to it, then.
I truly have no luck, do I...?
If this doesn't make the crone happy, at least the wolves will eat well...
That is it! I've had enough. Toss me in the dungeons, and throw away the key. I'm not killing another buck.
I'm sorry, poor buck. It's nothing personal.
Did you see that? Over there? And there? And...!?
Perhaps we should hop faster, ribbit!
My skin has grown all clammy from fear! Wait... It's always clammy...
Birds! Not the birds! Anything but birds! <croak>
I will best any man or woman in the realm!
Who dares interrupt my impending victory!?
Laugh at that, my brothers! Laugh at that!
See my brothers! This one is no match for Alaimbert!
I have yet to break a sweat!
I may not even need my butt!
You have tasted my spear, but are you ready for my butt!?
Thank you, kind adventurer! You saved my legs!
Once you've all witnessed the wrath of the spiked butt...
I shall be the only one laughing!
I am a Knight Dragoon! You are but an adventurer!
This pitiful display will prove naught to my brothers. Come harder!
I will not stop until my spear is notched and my butt is blunt!
Browfix will never fill braincase now...
What lost-thoughts hide 'twixt wordleaves? Browfix shall unfind!
A thrill it was to fight butt by side!
I cannot let my brothers see me fail. You understand.
I sense greatness within you, adventurer.
You have yet to show me all you have under that armor.
With butt in hand and you at my side, there are none who might stand in our way!
Let us put an <var 1A 02 /var>end<var 1A 01 /var> to this, quickly!
The creatures flee! The day is ours!
The bridge is overrun! Withdraw and regroup!
Mark my words! They won't be coming back again!
The lord commander will be sorely displeased...
Darkscale. You have no place here.
Silence, traitor! It is <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> who are guilty of trespass!
Your crimes against kith and kin are unforgivable. You shall be made to pay.
Never have I seen a sloth move with such swiftness!
Did you see the fear in that dragon's ugly face as my arrow pierced its neck?
What!? Do I detect a hint of jealousy in your voice?
Jealous that you stabbed an injured dragonling in the back while it was passed out?
That glory is all yours, my brother.
How dare you try and lessen the glory I have brought to all Convictors!
Whereas you have brought us nothing but shame!
The Convictors will suffer you no longer!
You would dare attack a brother unprovoked!?
Swear you will no longer sully our order's name!
The captain will hear of this affront!
Not as easy a mark as a dying dragon pup, am I?
Using an outsider to fight your own battles? Tell me, where is the glory in that!?
The killing blow was mine! Even you cannot deny that!
Too long did we wait... Too strong have you become...
I cannot fall! I am immortal...!
The morning star riseth in the east, granting me strength!
The malefic descendeth in the west, granting me knowledge!
The benefic shineth in the south, granting me life!
The pole star shineth in the north, granting me dominion!
I leave him in your capable hands.
Impressive for one all but forgotten.
Yet you turn to the sons of man for aid.
Pride is the sin which blackens your heart, Darkscale.
To make peace with the sons of man?
Those who will only betray you again?
This is not the end, Vedrfolnir.
Now what will I wear to the big pomfire, kupo?
Something big and hungry this way comes!
I beg of you, kind land- lord! He must be stopped!
Mogoosh will be the end of us all!
He cannot be allowed to carry on like this, kupo!
My father will hear of this affront.
Hear me, my children! I return to Tharl Oom Khash!
See that the traitor cannot follow!
You will not escape so easily, Darkscale!
We shall paint Zenith red with their lifeblood.
A traitor has no place above Sohm Al!
We shall cast your bones from her summit!
Nidhogg has poisoned the minds of so many...
How soon you forget the betrayal. It has been but a thousand short years!
I have not forgotten, but I have forgiven!
We must needs end this quickly. Come, my brothers!
I shall await you...in Sohm Al...
It appears weakness is my greatest weakness...
And to think, the day began so well...
A fine day to rest and reflect.
Another boring day in the Mists, kupo. There has to be something fun to do...
Kupo, kupo, and off we go!
Look! A flower, kupo! Isn't it beautiful!?
Might we rest a spell? My wings are exhausted!
This is a nice spot, kupo.
Maybe my friends were right to stay home, kupo...
Don't eat me! Don't eat me! Don't eat me, kupo!
Children of the land, answer my plea!
It appears he still has strength.
However, it fades fast. Prithee lend him aid!
Uncle... Wait for me in Sohm Al...
I am a rock! I will not budge!
So, it was you who summoned help.
I thank you, <var 08 E905 ((daughter of)) ((son of)) /var> man. Your bravery will not soon be forgotten.
I have a feeling we will meet again soon!
Thank you! But now I have to clean this whole tower myself, kupo...
You will go no further, traitors.
Your every move is known to me.
I will rip the limbs from you and feast on your entrails!
And to think we were so close to Zenith...!
Gahahaha! I will lick the flesh from your bones!
Is this the end for us...?
I thought I heard the sounds of fighting...
How fare you, my young ones?
Lord Vedrfolnir! Your presence heartens us all!
Well, look who joins the fray...
You will die with your precious younglings!
It was by your strength that we prevailed.
We have won the day, but there is no knowing when our foe will return.
Let us return to Zenith together.
We would be honored to, my lord.
This is the fate of a traitor!
We have done our duty here. Let us away!
You are so quick to retreat?
This battle was but a warning.
I care not whether you live or die, so long as you suffer.
You have suffered, and suffered well. Gahahaha!
Our foe's true target is Zenith... We must alert the others!
I pray I am not discovered...
I shall leave it in your capable hands.
You fought well, <var 08 E905 ((daughter)) ((son)) /var> of the Land. My thanks to you.
This does not look good for us...
It gladdens me to see you safe.
Now would be a good time to run, kupo.
Tch...! This is not going as I hoped...
Killing is fine sport. Being killed...not so much.
You have amused me for the day, my quarry.
But know this: I am ever the hunter, and you the hunted.
Flutter all you like, little one...
It will only make killing you all the sweeter!
No! I'm too cute to die, kupo!
What is this? My prey comes to me?
Yes, I shall slaughter the lot of you!
You will be my next plaything...
My playthings of late have proven far too...fragile.
I have not enjoyed myself so thoroughly in quite some time.
But there is more fun to be had, yes?
Ahhh, the thrill of the hunt!
A savage battle to the death!
The pain! The blood! The pleasure!
Is that all you have? Come! Come, I say!
It's as if the sight of blood urges him on, kupo!
Who are you calling “prey”!? I'm no one's dinner, kupo!
This one's not right in the head, kupo!
I will not yield to you!
I will not be shown up by a mortal!
Perfect... These ones should make a good sacrifice.
These ones will play with you next.
Again? Are you good for nothing!?
Mark my words─your end is nigh.
My minions, I leave the whelps to you.
And here I thought they would prove more useful...
You are next! Do not fail me!
Is there no end to the dishonor you bring me!?
So be it. It appears I have no choice.
The weave of a shinobi's power!
To bring down a foe of such power...
Your strength is great indeed, mortal.
You fight well for a miserable traitor.
The day we next meet shall be your last.
For all his bluster, he is but a craven snake.
The next time I shall give him the death he deserves.
I'll tear you limb from limb!
Yoyoroon love loots! Loots loots loots!♪
Your death shall come another day...
When next we meet, I will show no quarter!
You are no match for my minions!
My thanks, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I am at your back!
Darkscale! I have cornered you at last.
Your captains have all fallen to me.
This is my lair...and I have lured you into it.
You will not leave this place alive!
You are a worthy foe...for a traitor.
Face the truth, Darkscale! You are beaten!
O, Nidhogg! Give unto me your strength!
The crystals...! He drinks of their power!
The fire! It wells from within!
Now I shall smite you like the worm you are!
I cannot fall to this traitor...!
You know not what you do, Darkscale! The power you seek will destroy you!
Gladly would I give my life in service to my lord!
I must have more power! MORE!!!
No words will reach him now...
Steel yourself. We face a desperate foe.
COME, AND I SHALL SMITE YOU!
Such power is mine, and still the traitor does not fall!
Give unto me all there is to give!
You only hasten your own demise, Darkscale!
GRAHAHAHA... I HAVE DRUNK MY FILL.
He has exceeded his physical limits.
What drives him to such madness...?
COME, TRAITOR!!! I SHALL TEAR THE WINGS FROM YOUR BACK!!!
MY CLAWS SHALL RIP THE SCALES FROM YOUR FLESH AS MY FIRE CHARS YOUR CORPSE TO A SHRIVELED HUSK!!!
Alas, the proud dragon who once lived is now gone...
Consumed by power and hate, he is but a machine of destruction now.
Join me, mortal, and let us put Darkscale out of his misery!
I AM DARKSCALE, GENERAL OF NIDHOGG! I WILL NOT FALL TO THIS TRAITOR!
I MUST HAVE MORE POWER...! More...power...
I take no joy in Darkscale's end, but at last, these halls will know peace again.
Till we meet again, O hero among mortals.
My claws! My precious adamantite claws! Look what you've done to them!
Oh, you'll pay! Don't think that you won't pay!
For your wanton destruction, I sentence you to death!
...and his power grows with each passing moment.
But if not I, who shall defend the spire!?
I will not abandon those who suffer at Darkscale's ravaging claws!
It does not even scathe him...? Inconceivable!
No! I will not fall to this fiend who casts away his pride!
Even if I must give my life in the trying!
His power... It was too great...
YOU DIE AS YOU LIVED─A TRAITOR!
NOW YOUR FOUL BROOD WILL FEEL MY FLAMES!
KNOW YOUR TRUE LORD, DRAGONLINGS! AND FEAR HIM!
This looks as good a place as any, I reckon.
Please, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>! I beg ye! Drive the beasts afield!
Now if I can just catch something...anything.
The wife'll have me head if I come home without a catch.
All this thrashin' about... There won't be a fish left in the entire river!
The day is yours, but you have not seen the last of me.
You are a craven and a traitor both!
When next we meet, you will not leave with your life.
You'll not best me so easily!
I will kill you if it is the last thing I do!
Vileki─ No... Those aren't vilekin... They're...
Twelve help us! They've come for the bloody mint!
Keep that mint safe, or we'll be elbow-deep in vilekin as well!
The mint has sent the things into a right frenzy!
Might serve us better if we tossed the mint back down to Ishgard...
At least they won't be coming back?
Thanks for the help, mysterious stranger!
Oi! Gundu! The whole bloody lot of you are cravens!
Bowing and scraping for your Vundu masters! How pathetic!
Like furious summer squall I piss on the Gundu! Hear me!? I piss on you!
Piss on Gundu!? Gundu piss on your corpse!
As surely as sun rises and sets, Gundu find and punish netherling!
Begone, dark ones! These lands belong to Vundu!
Meddlesome as gaelicats! Kill them all! Kill them all!
Netherling is strong, like a dragon without wings.
The skies grow dark... Kena Vanu will fight another day.
As sure as the night swallows the sun, your time will come...
For Kena Vanu, Vundu would cast himself into the swirling winds!
Netherling will pay for sullying the white of the clouds─in blood!
Infidels! You will suffer the divine judgment of the White!
To stand against Kena Vanu is as a minnow baring its teeth against the White.
Come, Skvader! Crush these netherlings like gastornis eggs!
The sun shall soon set on you, netherling!
This island will fall from the sky before a netherling defeats Kena Vanu!
Foolish netherling! Drink from the rains of despair!
No, it will not end like this!
You shall join me in the abyss!
You lust for blood? I shall give it to you!
There is no greater thrill than the hunt!
Yesss, this is what I live for!
Nothing stirs the blood like struggling prey!
That I should be pressed so by their ilk...
I had not reckoned upon this...
Fly like the craven you are!
They were persistent if naught else.
We have wasted enough time here.
Darkscale is headed for Tharl Oom Khash.
Let us go and settle this once and for all!
Come, my young ones. I will tend to your wounds.
To think that one of your kind could boast the strength to fell Nidhogg's trusted general...
Yet you have not tapped the depths of your potential!
Show me the strength by which you did slay the mighty Darkscale!
Yes! I knew that it was so...
The power ensconced within you is great indeed, mortal...
Yes, the power to make even a mighty dragon tremble...
I would see you harness your power to its limits, and beyond!
There is more power in you yet, mortal!
That's it. I'm movin' to Falcon's Nest!
The damned things'll suck me dry!
I've been cursed, I tell ye!
Find a bloody chocobo's arse to suckle!
I don't know how to thank ye! Here's the coin I promised.
The vile fiends are befouling the river!
<click> <click> You. Fleshling. Help me kill them.
<click> <click> You win this day, miacids. But the war is not over...
They are many, but we are strong!
<click> <click> I grow weak. I go to inform the others.
Carry on in my stead if you can...
For the nourishment of our bodies...
Netherling fells my Skvader! Rage swirls within me like a storm!
Gwahahaha! Bow before the White, netherling.
I am power both ancient and unrivaled...
I do not bleed, for I am but strength given form...
Feeble creatures of flesh... Your time is nigh!
Wh-What in the seven hells is that thing!?
Rain of shame floods gobbie goggles...
We'll be back! You can't watch the whole forest!
This one'll fetch a fine price, I reckon!
I'll slice you up and feed you to the bears!
I've seen baby chocobos put up more fight!
Hah hah! If I don't eat her first! Hah hah hah!
If ye see her, grab her!
By the power of the Eye!
Drop your weapons and you'll receive a swift death!
The Eorzeans will pay for this!
Stay alert! The enemy may still lurk nearby.
Do not forget why we are here.
I think I may have found something! Or not...
To think a mortal could wield such might!
Truly, there is no limit to your powers.
This battle is not over yet. No, I have only scratched the surface of my strength...
You are possessed of great power─and the strength of will to control it.
It was an honor and a pleasure to meet you on the battlefield.
Farewell, hero among mortals. I will remember you.
I saw great promise, great strength in you.
Alas, it seems that I was mistaken...
Who dares disturb─? Oho, it is you.
I daresay this encounter is no mere chance.
If you would test your strength against me, I would be honored to meet your challenge!
There will be more. Do not let down your guard!
We lay claim to this land in the name of the Emperor!
You stand in the way of progress!
Alive or dead, the legatus cares not.
We will have to report this to the legatus!
Illuminati brainfruit is frontmost! Brings much blastydoom to enemy!
None can withstand ironfist of Illuminati!
Backwalk away or meet oversoon doom!
Backgive whizzlepops or feel oversharp pain!
Sound battlebells! To arms, to arms!
I shall show you something special!
For the honor of House Fortemps!
Zundu must flee this place on the wings of the wind!
Zundu legs are as heavy as tree trunks!
Be wary! Cruel Vundu trail us like a shadow.
Vundu surround us like a choking fog!
Zundu feels hope, like a ray of sun to chase the night!
My homeland greets my eyes like a rainbow on the horizon!
Such treachery! Like a dark cloud on a summer's day!
At last, the storm is over and blue skies return!
Here Zundu is safe as a bird in its mother's breast.
Netherling is strong as wind, and gentle as the kiss of the morning dew.
Zundu remember your kindness for many summers to come.
Zundu feels a presence behind like storm clouds on the horizon.
Zundu hears voices, like the whispers of the rain.
Zundu tires of being Vundu footrest. Zundu just wants to go home.
The beasts come, roaring in like a tempest!
Vundu come, on angry wings of thunder!
What is this? Am I saved?
My brother, you look as if battered by raging winds.
Oh, what fortune! Like a ray of sun breaking through the clouds, you are!
My brother, your heart seems as restless as the stormy seas.
Were you perhaps chased here by the cruel Vundu?
Worry not, for I shall guide you home on a gentle breeze...
Come, and take shelter under my wing...
Thank you, brother! My heart shines like the sun!
Your breathing grows heavy, brother. Let us rest here.
...Ahhh. The rest refreshes me like a mountain spring.
Thank you, brother. Now let us be off before the storms come.
Why rush? I see no clouds on the horizon.
N-No! It was just the rustling of the wind.
Finally! I thought spring might come before you arrived!
Foolish Zundu. Time to return and fulfill your fate as a footstool.
You have escaped Vundu clutches for the last time.
Proud, peaceful Zundu is not a piece of furniture!
Netherling is a ray of light in Zundu's darkest hour.
I must hurry back to Ok' Zundu like the wind...
...and tell my brothers of this Vundu treachery.
Oh, woe! Is there no end to my dark days?
There are tracks leading this direction!
Your orders are to take no survivors!
You won't leave this place alive!
Toss the bodies over the edge.
The retreat is sounded! Fall back! Fall back!
All for Tarasque! All for Tarasque!
This one shall make a fine offering!
Uplander must make swiftheels with Slicktrix!
New vangob is complete! Idyllshire is in danger!
Shkohhh... Slicktrix must be telling shirefriends!
With a spear as stiff as ice, I thrust!
Like the majestic Coerthan puffer, I swell!
Like the surging waters of the mighty Coerthas, I come!
Unauthorized temporal signature detected. Initiating elimination protocol.
This one shall make an excellent offering.
My blood, my body, my soul─as one!
Die, abomination! The Fury wills it!
Here they come! Protect the mint!
Zundu wants for water as pure as the morning dew!
Zundu is as busy as a whirlwind! Zundu wants for aid!
Like the clouds weep rain, Zundu cries for water!
There must be more around here somewhere...
What I wouldn't give for a helping hand!
Hm. I could do with a few more.
That was too close! Mayhap another time...
I knew the beast wasn't ready!
You'll be the envy of your friends!
The infernal contraptions are come! Let us eradicate this threat to Thanalan!
Hearken to my words! Glory in the song of rebirth!
We cannot allow these fiends to mar the celebrations!
This is an infestation... Mayhap I should have brought more arrows!
We must stem this cold, metal tide!
They swarm in such numbers... 'Tis time for the stirring climax.
Do not let them...overrun the land...
Victory! The bugs will not soon recover from this slaughter.
Thank you, adventurer. The field is ours this day!
Their numbers are too great... Let us fall back and regroup!
The faire is here at last!
Move aside! Let the lady pass!
You won't lay a finger on m'lady!
Let us grovel at your feet!
I just want to go to the faire...
Finally, I can enjoy the fireworks.
Please, at least pat my head.
Don't let her come to harm...
Why can Bugaal Ja not bathe at beach!?
You've been banned from the beach!
You jealous of bathing dance? I teach you!
Stop that! I've never seen such...undulations.
Smoothskins just jealous they cannot dance so!
Forbidden from hot springs, forbidden from beach...
But you cannot stop dance! Never!
Then dance out of my sight!
Heavens forfend anyone gets any ideas...
We'll be havin' our own faire!
You thought the Bombards were fierce!?
Thank you! Our guests should be safe now.
Don't let us see you near here again!
I will bathe, and I will dance!
Why...why do you despise me so...?
But I can't unsee his gyrations...
Now you see the power of my dance!
You are undeserving of my tradition!
If he returns, I may call on you again.
I can't pick these up alone.
Godsdamn, we'll have to try something else...
One sip'll perk you right up.
We can drink it right here.
Nothin' beats grog on the beach.
Come on, lass, I'll carry you.
Been itchin' for a little fun an' games!
Get your hands away from me!
Not the “fun” you had in mind, eh!?
Bend over and kiss your arse good-bye!
How do you like ribs? Broken!?
Gods be good, get the others!
We slaved away on those fireworks...
Intruders are too late! Too late!
Scamper all you will. My lance will find you...
I shall pierce your very soul!
You defy the only rightful god!
You shall fall, as did your ally!
Our moment is come, Ser Janlenoux!
Now, Brothers! Unleash the full power of the Heavens' Ward!
Lances at the ready... Now fly!
No shield will defend you from the spear of my conviction!
<var 60 0234 /var>Have you tested your tactics with Lord of Verminion? Assemble your loyal minions, and come to Minion Square!
<var 60 0234 /var>A Lord of Verminion tournament is about to begin. Prospective entrants are encouraged to register at Minion Square!
<var 60 0234 /var>A Lord of Verminion tournament is currently underway! Prospective challengers are invited to assemble in Minion Square!
<var 60 0234 /var>Lord of Verminion tournament registration will close momentarily. Prospective challengers, please hasten to Minion Square!
<var 60 0234 /var>Another thrilling Lord of Verminion tournament has drawn to a close! The winners will be announced in Minion Square. We hope to see everyone back for the next competition!
By what unholy strength have we been bested...?
But there is no time for talk. The crabs come!
I am reminded of a tale from long ago...
...Of fledgling adventurers who would fight crabs like these to better themselves.
I pray our training is as successful as theirs was.
I believe that will suffice for now.
Fighting alongside such a seasoned warrior has been educational.
I am grateful that you chose to accompany me.
If only I had taken a proper meal beforehand...
'Tis as if the very air is tainted by darkness...
Minions of the Shadow Lord!? From whence did they come?
These demons... They call to mind another old story.
To surpass his limits, a great samurai once fought such fiends...
Perhaps by defeating these demons I can do the same.
It would seem we have driven them back.
Alas, I could scarcely match your pace. This will not do.
There must be a way for me to improve more quickly...
It would seem we have underestimated our enemy...
But I cannot fail─not with so much at stake...
Look! Over there! Could it be...?

STAB HIM IN THE SOFT OF THE BELLY!

Ah, chivalry! The truest art. Please do.
That's what I get for being distracted...
I can do no more. We must flee!
I have not yet shuffled off this mortal coil? Huzzah!
We should make haste lest any more are about.
Ha! That's right, run back to your precious refuge.
Take your “victory.” Just remember, you'll never be <var 1A 02 /var>safe.<var 1A 01 /var>
There's nowhere in this world you can run.
Lali-ho, lali-ho,♪ It's off to work, I go.♪
Maybe I'll stumble across some ore on the way home...
It is no good... The Cupsss are doomed...
Look! I brought your favorite coral!
Not when I am ssso close!
I must provide what succor I can...
Ha ha! Thanksss for doing our job for usss!
You think you have me beaten!?
Now go, as fast as you can!
Our allies will see you to safety!
That was easier than I thought!
We shhhall feed you to Archaeotania!
I will not bow to the likes of you!
Hm... I may need some bigger cogs...
And the actuator will require additional tuning...
Overall, I'd say this test was a rousing success!
Ah, I'm bleeding again. Rather heavily!
<sigh> Hang on─ I'll staunch the wound.
And here come the dracones. Naturally.
Don't mind me. Just being savaged by dracones here.
Why does this <var 1A 02 /var>always<var 1A 01 /var> happen to me?
We'll be on our way! Now where's that knife...
No, no more touching sharp objects!
Yes, yes! These readings will prove invaluable!
I am here, foul Goggs! Tremble before my masterpiece!
Wait... One, two, three, four─ Dastards! Have you no honor!?
Bwahahaha! Says the dwarf who brought only one doll!
We'll melt her down to scrap!
That's not fair! You had help!
Have you no honor, cheating Tholl!
You'll pay, interloper! Don't think you won't pay!
Run, cowards! And next time bring a bigger army!
Perhaps you would be game for a game, yes?
I call it “Kill or Be Killed!”
The rules are, as you can imagine, rather simple...
Not interested? I can't say I blame you!
I have to say, I'm rather good at this game!
I say, have you played this before?
Well, I think that's enough for one day! Ta-ta for now!
Go and be finlesss somewhere elssse!
My curse will consume you from within!
In life and in death I serve Ronka...
Forever bound to this place by sacred pact...
For the empire... For the emperor...
I am sure thisss is the place.
Those benthos beat us to it...
What happened here? Were you attacked?
Hahaha! Oh, you righteous fools are too easy to snare.
You're just so <var 1A 02 /var>predictable<var 1A 02 /var>. Ha... Haha... Ahahaha!
You will never <var 1A 02 /var>belong<var 1A 01 /var> here. Not like us.
Keep your <var 1A 02 /var>peace<var 1A 01 /var>. It won't save you.
That could've gone much worse, if you hadn't come along.
I ought to have known better.
Nightshade never tires of dirty tricks.
Get moving. We don't have the time to waste here.
You made a hash of it, then?
Look, we had the same problem with the strongholds...
The arrogance of the Crystarium's ignorant knows no bounds.
Well, we'll have to see to that.
Let's make sure they get what's coming to them.
These lands were always ours. Now more than ever.
The finlesss ones and their pathetic friends shhhall perish!
The mighty one will sssup on your fleshhh!
You would unleash that evil upon the Tempessst!?
You go on ahead. I will hold them off here!
I do believe it's time that I took center stage!
Have care. We know not what lies within...
Perhaps there's a pattern to their movements.
I must ask that you refrain from wandering...
Oh, I wouldn't dream of it! La la la♪
It'll be finished when I say it's finished, and I say it's not finished! At least not yet.
Well, let me know when it is! I don't want to miss when we crush the Tholls!
Who goes there!? A Tholl spy!?
Help! Someone! Anyone! I'm too short to die!
Not the beard! Not the beard!
They've got us by the beard! To the hills!
That will teach you to stick your beard in Gogg business!
You won't see me again! I swear it!
These legs can only carry us so far. We must fight!
The battle is lost! Fall back, fall back!
I knew it! The Goggs are up to no good!
Any friend of the Tholls is an enemy of ours!
Let seep sorrow into your heart.
Our secret weapon is almost complete!
You may have defeated us today, but tomorrow shall be ours!
Tell me your plan or I'll have your helm!
Not if you're rotting in our gaol!
You wouldn't stab a dwarf in the back now, would you?
Run today, live to fight another day!
You are out of your element!
Wake up! Wake up, damn you!
I don't think I've ever seen anywhere so peaceful and serene.
Ha ha! I will give it some thought.
Oh, Gridania is a wonderful place indeed! You should stay a while.
I hope Editha is all right!
Please, take good care of her.
If you require my assistance, do not hesitate to ask!
Editha, you mustn't run off like that again!
Do you know who could be behind these attacks?
Yes, I think we've gathered that much...
Glad to see the threat of assassination has done little to dampen your mood.
Are you alright? You've gone pale...
Ah... Your eyes tell the tale.
We were too slow to save them!
We free their souls. That is all we can do...
I feel my skin prickling. What is this boiling aether...?
The manor house is just up ahead!
We are close... Be on your guard!
As is the source of this suffocating aether...
The sheer power... I can sense its strength from here!
Gods... This must be the Warden!
...We stand in the presence of a Lightwarden.
Aye, this is the true scourge of Lakeland!
Are they preparing for an assault?
Everyone at the ready! We strike first!
How <var 1A 02 /var>noble<var 1A 01 /var> of you to come to us!
We'll put you out of your misery!
Now you see the futility of the <var 1A 02 /var>good<var 1A 01 /var>.
The only glory is in sin!
Only the wicked will walk these lands!
There are too many of them!
Only the elves truly know this world we have created.
You were never going to succeed.
We just don't have the numbers...
What will become of Lakeland now?
Echoes, I think. But there is something strange about them.
Bows, with me! We have work to do!
It seems that they are diseased.
We must cull them before the sickness can spread.
We have allowed too many of them to escape...
Perhaps we will find some of them on our patrol.
Bows! It is time to leave!
Those crawlers must be what is spreading the disease!
My thoughts exactly. Sisters, you know what to do.
That should put a stop to the disease.
We are running dangerously low on arrows, though.
I suggest that we go and gather feathers for flights.
We let too many of them get away.
These tarichuks are tougher than they look...
I had best stop there. No point dying for a bunch of feathers.
This should suffice. Your assistance is much appreciated.
That is enough for the time being.
I will take those feathers off of your hands!
Bring me as many feathers as you can. It matters not how you get them.
Keep your eyes peeled for trouble.
They are attacking the ancient guardian!
To think that the ancient guardian could be defeated...
There is little more we can do here. Let us return.
It seems the danger has passed.
Come. We must report this to the others.
Did you hear that? It sounded like a roar...
If that is what I think it is, we must hurry!
Many a sister has died fighting that beast.
It is heading towards the village!
Quickly, there is no time to lose!
We have it running for its life. Now is our chance!
Sisters, we shall fight to the last!
This must be one of its defenses.
Do not get too close, sisters!
Your reign of terror has lasted long enough.
May the fallen rest in peace.
For now. Though Tojil is slain, our work is never done.
Let us return to the village.
We cannot allow the disease to spread!
Get them away from the ancient guardian!
Those that threaten the forest must perish!
Careful, mortal! The bees are everywhere...
It's not much, but I'm <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> going over there...
In fact, let's leave. Quickly. Yes.
I'll just start backing away slowly...
Let's get the herbs and go.
Please... My friend─he'll die without these!
But you'll have so much more fun with us!
Now we can get what we came for.
I can't go back without the nectar...
At last, I can go home and─
I am <var 1A 02 /var>never<var 1A 01 /var> doing nectar duty again...
If I didn't need that nectar, I swear...
Now I can get to the Bookman's Shelves.
They do look ever so peaceful...
...and that won't do, will it now?
Hmm, I believe it is time we took our leave.
We would thank you for the fun...
...if only you weren't quite so dull!
I daresay we shall find better sport elsewhere.
They're doubtless off to trouble some other poor soul.
I'll keep an eye on them.
We shall have to find out!
A wee bit of this, and...yes!
Oh dear. Are you quite alright?
I say! That's rather painful, sir!
I suppose we have our answer.
It wasn't even a funny prank! Unacceptable!
Perhaps this fellow can be of assistance.
Oh, dear, would you look at that...
It will take <var 1A 02 /var>ages<var 1A 01 /var> to collect more...
Our persistent pixie. What a lovely surprise!
You stop this nonsense at once!
Oho, they seem to be keeping up.
Shall we give them a chance?
A magicked tree? What do you take me for?
If we were to be honest...
But there is time for sport yet!
You are an entertaining lot indeed.
Oh, no. Not yet, I think!
But perhaps if you follow us south...
But I do hope they'll do better than a <var 1A 02 /var>tree<var 1A 01 /var>.
We are <var 1A 02 /var>so<var 1A 01 /var> pleased to have you here...
Much more entertaining than we expected.
If only I could say the same for you.
You haven't seen the half of us yet!
Ha! Fuath tricks don't scare me!
Now I teach you a thing or two!
But wouldn't the Bookman's Shelves be a more appropriate venue?
I thought you might say that!
...and it turns out we're not <var 1A 02 /var>quite<var 1A 01 /var> done...
Now, if you'll just come this way...
At this point, it seems only fair to mention...
<var 1A 02 /var>We'll<var 1A 01 /var> have great fun either way, of course.
I don't doubt that. You have terrible taste.
While there's still fun to be had?
But what a loss it was!
We really must do this again sometime!
It seems we are the victors!
We thank you for the diversion...
You could at least <var 1A 02 /var>try<var 1A 01 /var> to fight back.
A bit more savagery, if you please.
Those horrid bandits won't spoil my day!
And come to think of it, where are we going?
There are shinies waiting for us near Twitch!
Bloody hells! Why there of all the places?
Creatures burrow into the sand there!
Which would unearth buried treasure... Not a bad idea, I'll admit.
You mentioned burrowing creatures, but I don't see any...
Hold on, do you think they're still under the sand?
Get back, Rhal Ral! You'll only get in my way!
We've walked right into their trap!
This is all your fault! Grrr... No choice but to run!
Had enough, eh? You sand-swallowing bastards!
We are alive! But more importantly, where is that treasure?
Hmm? A map! It looks like the Fields of Amber.
There is a picture of a gigantender to the south...
...And what looks like a necklace nearby.
Then what are we waiting for?
The treasure must be where gigantenders roam!
What I wouldn't give for a moment's peace...
Lizards. That's all we bloody need.
We'd do well to steer clear of that lot.
Of course! You know I am not one to take risks!
No, but I usually end up taking them in your place.
Oh, this is not good... But we must not give up!
Rhal Ral! Fancy lending a hand?
Bugger the treasure! I'd rather be poor than dead!
Thanks, mate. We'd be lizard food if it weren't for you.
Yes, yes! There will be time for that later! On with the treasure hunt!
Maybe not the shinies, but look over there!
Footprints... Judging by the shape and stride length...
It must be over two hundred years old!
If it was dormant when this map was made, they could have used it as a landmark!
They normally don't wander far from their territory...
...So these tracks will probably lead to that necklace.
Ah. I think we've found our gigantender.
We'll have to cut that thing down to size before we can start the search.
Show it what you are made of, Darmal!
Argh! I can't give up, not when we're so close!
Better to run and scavenge another day!
How do you like that, you overgrown cactus!
We have found it! The treasure!
The necklace! Snatched away from us!
That was Offscoursman! The sparkling must've caught its eye!
For once, we're of the same mind, Rhal Ral!
It flew in this direction, yes?
Now all we have to do is kill it... Easier said than done.
Ha ha! The necklace is ours!
Now, let us take a closer look...
Ah, yes. The mark of five coins. This was made for the Nabaath royal family!
So it must be worth a fair bit, then?
Yes! I cannot wait to have it properly appraised!
Let us make our way to Mord Souq!
Our venture was a great success. Now to head to the hills!
What!? I thought we were going home!
And we will, after a quick detour!
Here we are! The Hills of Amber!
Erm... And what are we doing here?
I'd rather you just told me...
Ha ha ha! Good luck with that!
In the desert, no one can hear you die!
You're in the wrong place, at the wrong time.
Blame your own bad luck, mate.
Help, I say! These men are bandits!
All right, don't get your breeches in a twist. You stay back, Rhal Ral.
Think you're a hero, do you?
Keep out of this, old man!
Job's done. Time to scarper, lads!
On second thought, let us forget the detour! Back to Mord Souq it is!
You haven't seen the last of us!
Got some fight in you, eh?
Let's see how you like this!
Thank you, strangers. My name is Ingi, and I came here to find gemstones.
I am Rhal Ral, and this is my associate, Darmal.
We are in search of treasure!
Yes! I bought an old Ronso scroll...
...which revealed the location of the Elderblade!
It's in the Hills of Amber, the traditional home of the Ronso. Do you know anything about it?
I can't say I recognize the name, but the “Elder” part is familiar...
Please, if you know something, you must tell us!
Well, I am not sure it will be sufficient payment for saving my life, but I will do what I can.
But do you mind if I stop by my house first?
I shan't keep you waiting long.
By all means, lead the way!
It is good to be home, safe and sound.
I will be with you in a few moments.
Take your time. We're in no rush.
But sooner is better than later!
This time, we won't go so easy on you!
Back for a second helping, eh?
Next time we see you, you're dead!
Rhal Ral! Are you all right!?
Gods be good! Did those bandits come back!?
Go on, run, you bunch of milksops! Rhal Ral, are you hurt?
Thank you for waiting. Is everything all right?
I am glad to hear it. Shall we go and find this blade, then?
It was named after one of the greatest elders in the history of my people.
He was known for his prowess in battle...
...but I expect this Elderblade of which you speak also carried symbolic significance.
So it's not just a fancy name?
The blade of the elder! It all makes sense now!
This is Kelk, or what is left of it.
Armadillos! And so many of them!
Traveler, will you help us get rid of them?
Do not let them corner you!
Oh? Are you not going to fight as well, Rhal Ral?
He's more the “sit back and watch” sort.
I believe the correct term is “offer moral support”!
Once I am properly dressed, I am unstoppable!
This is not going well! You must withdraw!
Outdone by armadillos! I'll never live this down!
That was the last of them.
Then let us uncover the Elderblade before any more turn up!
Hello, hello. This coffer looks promising.
And not a pleasant one, either.
I had a feeling it was too good to be true.
Not yet! There is one more thing I would like to try!
Nabaath mages enchanted swords to do their bidding...
...and the Elderblade was probably full of...errr...magic!
So if they used it to create an evil weapon...
Oh no... I'm not going to like this, am I?
...there have been sightings of an exceedingly large evil weapon not far from here.
Can you show us where it was last seen?
Looks like it's not here. Oh well, never mind.
It's even worse than I thought...
Umm... Are you sure about this?
Yes... Yes! Get me that blade!
Th-This was never meant to happen...
Flee the way you came! Even worse lies ahead...
I was scared! I thought it would kill you, then me!
Phew! I thought the damned thing would never give up!
The Elderblade is mine! I mean, ours!
I can scarcely believe we survived...
I never doubted you for a moment! You all fought very well!
The sword of the great Kelk, enchanted by Nabaath magicks...
Even now that the spell has been broken, the power within is undeniable.
Which should see that it fetches a high price!
Rhal Ral, this blade must never fall into the wrong hands. We must ensure that it finds a worthy owner.
Preferably one who does not mind parting with a few jinglies!
Are you quite all right, brother?
You know, you're quite fun! As mortals go.
Not the least bit contrite, are you?
Why be contrite when you're so keen to fight?
It's all starting to come back to me now.
Let us see what we can find.
My magicks are unending, my loyalty undying!
I shall turn the very ground against you!
My flames shall raze your very soul!
My ice shall chill the very essence of your being!
The future is ours, and ours alone!
We will relinquish it to no one. No one!
The most renowned swordsman of the Far East is about to descend upon the Gold Saucer!
His skills with a blade must be seen to be believed, but blink and you'll miss them, so keep those eyes peeled!
This is the moment I've been waiting for!
I heard his blade is so sharp, he can split infinitives, whatever that means...
I blinked! Did I miss anything?
Behold, the sword art of legend─Zanmato!
Thank your lucky stars Zanmato thirsts not for your blood!
Go, Daigoro! Bring me those koban!
My eyes can barely keep up!
I've never seen anything like it!
Fortune favors the bold, and if you are truly worthy, your luck will hold!
Three cups I present! One contains riches, another my faithful hound! And the last...well, nothing at all!
Uncover the coin, and it is yours. Chance upon Daigoro, and you will be sent running with your tail between your legs!
Before I count to three, make your choice!
Well, well! The kami smile upon you, brave one!
If you are still game, so am I!
This is as far as you go!
The cup is quicker than the eye!
We believe mochi mixed with waters from the Daitenzan's soulspring has stolen its way into our stores!
From the soulspring...? Do you mean to tell me this mochi is alive!?
Damn it, Gozu has been spooked. Quickly, we must dispense with the mochi!
The living mochi must have come from last year's celebration. But how...?
I fear our little game must soon come to an end. One last chance for Zanmato to shine!
Fleet of foot, and fortunate to boot! A well-deserved victory!
Alas, it was not your lucky day, my friend. Though I must say, you certainly made me work hard for my coin!
Krow ot emit ti si? Swish-swish-aroo.
Yojimbo is currently discussing his fee, though I'm sure it won't take much longer.
It seems that we have reached an agreement with Yojimbo, who is due to appear any moment now.
Sear the flesh from their bones!
None can withstand the flames of Lugus!
It's like it goes on forever...
I don't like the looks of that.
Don't kill me... Don't kill me...
Does that count as a machine lifeform?
Was...was that the mage we seek?
I have a bad feeling about this.
Well, I'd say we're off to a fine start.
Do those brooms not remind you of Master Matoya?
Magicked brooms? Now where have I seen these before?
It has to be a trap... It's always a trap.
I sense a malign magic in the air.
Her Grace's gardens. As beautiful as ever.
I almost feel bad interrupting their meal. Even if they are only illusions.
I can but wonder how lonely they must be.
Their mastery of illusions is impressive.
Keep it together, Alphinaud. They're only illusions...
Wonderful, more illusions. And now they're dancing this time.
An eerie yet beautiful sight, is it not?
It's as if we're glimpsing into the past.
Please! We did not come to fight!
Well, so much for the diplomatic approach.
Oh dear. They don't yet seem inclined to talk.
Wait! We only wish to talk!
I knew this was a bad idea.
Not exactly a good first impression, but it will have to suffice.
I doubt they will be quite so affable when next we meet.
Is there no end to these creatures?
Another chance to garner their interest.
They certainly have a gift for creating familiars. If only there were not so many...
I had hoped it was only a topiary. Alas...
Mayhap now we have sown the seeds of interest.
Well, I'd rather not have to do that again...
I've had my fill of this garden. Let us move on.
Perhaps now they see us as more than mere intruders.
By the gods, they've given life to flame!
Looks like they're finally taking us seriously.
Have care. There's something peculiar about those flames.
I do believe we now have not only their curiosity, but their attention as well.
<sob> Please... I don't want to use this power anymore...
<sob> I have no place in the world...
There, there. Everything is fine, now.
I see no further signs of wayward mochi about. Let us return to Limsa Lominsa for now.
I fear this is too much for us. Fall back!
Is there no end to this blasted mochi?
Careful! No harm must come to Gozu!
Be sure to stand clear of Gozu!
Foolish bamboo! You dare to face my blade!?
Let the bamboo fall where it may!
Well, I'd say we're off to a fine start.
Perhaps. But how long our good fortune holds remains to be seen.
How quaint. They remind me of Master Matoya's brooms.
You and I remember those brooms─and their owner─quite differently.
Oh dear. They don't yet seem inclined to talk.
Well, it was your idea to brandish blades at the door.
I doubt they will be quite so affable when next we meet.
Another chance to pique their curiosity, then.
Her Grace's gardens. As beautiful as ever.
The path makes a curious pattern. Not unlike a magicked circle.
Is there no end to these creatures?
If they think a few plants can slow us down, they're sorely mistaken.
If we dried these leaves... Perhaps we could use them for tea!
Oh come now, Alphinaud. Don't be silly.
Haha, very funny. I know they're not ghosts. ...At least I hope they're not.
I do believe we now have not only their curiosity, but their attention as well.
Then we had best not waste it.
The chivalric spirit shall prevail this day!
Excellent, the work's just about done! You've all earned a good rest!
Save for these weapons there's naught to be found here.
Perhaps these will serve to refresh his memory.
Right, we've got enough supplies! It's time to put 'em to use!
To start with, we're buildin' facilities on the east side. Grab yourselves some material and hop to!
Here's where we lay the foundation for the new Firmament! Show me what you can do!
We're stocked up on supplies again. Let's get back to it!
We're pickin' up where we left off on the east side. Take what material you need and set to work!
If we keep our heads down, we'll finish it today. Neat and tidy does it!
Aye, that's enough supplies, I reckon. Right, everyone, let's get to work!
This time we're buildin' facilities on the west side. Grab some material and put your backs into it!
Show me what it means to have pride in your work!
Right, we've replenished the supplies we used up last time.
We're continuin' our work on the west side. You know what to do!
We're almost through with this task. Let's stay focused to the last!
Look alive, everyone! Today, we're lightin' up the court!
Use the material to make firewood, then feed it to the braziers─it's simple as that.
Let's stoke a roarin' fire to match our builders' spirit!
Right, our stores are lookin' good. It's time to add the finishin' touches!
Grab some material─we're refurbishin' the skybuilders' board and makin' a kitchen to boot!
Keep your hearts in it, everyone! We're just about done with the court!
What in the Fury's name? After all this time, this is all we've managed? <sigh> We're going to have to start over...
Stay away from me! Stay away!
Get out... Get out of my head...
Yeowch! I-I don't want to become porxelain!
Nooo! The water will warp my winsome curves!
Ack! Burst this bubble, will you!
Just so! Empower me with your hatred, your despair!
Curse you, Father! You sent him to his death!
Savages! You stole him from me!
Brother, do not leave me, I beg you!
What surprise is in store for us next, I wonder.
I trust you'll make the right choice this time.
I will defer to your judgment.
Whatever comes out, we can handle it.
Soon we can quit this place.
Quickly, before they can overwhelm us!
That should be the last of the chamber's defenses.
I am glad that is over...
The site of the Bozja incident...
(Did it appear because he mentioned the Principia, I wonder?)
I say we strike before they can regroup.
Why bother? They're but ants beneath our boot.
You know the price for insurrection!
Father was so angry that day...
What is the meaning of thisss?
Come unto flesh, O forgotten form...
Every last one of you will die!
Die, and lie beneath the silt!
I regret to disappoint, but I'm more than comfortable with heights!
If you have any complaints about the schedule, feel free to take them up with Master Wawalago.
Would that I had brought my own rod... Perhaps if I... Ah, what am I thinkin'? I've captainly duties to attend to!
The stronger the bite, the bigger the fish!
Fish might look simple, but some can be mighty particular when it comes to their bait.
Fish! Fish with every scantling of your being!
Fish twice as hard, for my sake!
Hah hah, the feast is here!
If you can't land a catch now, I'll have to ask you to turn in your rod!
Distraction's a fisher's worst enemy! Focus on your rod! Focus!
When the sun sets, the sea comes alive.
Once, one of my crew dropped a lantern overboard. The waters started glittering as if to thank us!
Rumor has it that during rough weather is when the spectral megalodon sets out on its hunt.
Pray you don't disturb the spectral megalodon. I've heard stories of it swallowin' whole crews in one gulp.
In the dead of night, I swear I've seen the coral itself movin' about like some kind of worm.
There ain't a shrimp to be found in these waters. What's eatin' them, you think?
The spectral discus is a sight to see, but it'll startle at the smallest sound.
Watch out for the spectral discus─it ain't tiny, so I reckon it'll be hard to miss!
What? Are those...mouse bones? What in the seven hells happened here?
If you're in the mood for a fright, try fishin' here in the dark. You won't regret it─or maybe you will!
This heat's rough, but if you can bear the sun beatin' down on you, you'll have your pick of the fish.
The fish here are huge, and slow as they come! Shouldn't be hard to land a catch.
Last time we made land someone told me of a fish that swims with the risin' sun.
I've seen some fishers have luck with a longer cast.
The fish here might be small, but they're as fierce as any in the sea!
When the wind howls and the thunder claps, the prize catches come out to swim.
They say when thunder rolls across the sky, it whips certain fish into a frenzy. So they say, anyway.
If you're lookin' to bait the spectral current, you'll want to cast for the little fish, I reckon.
Local legend has it that when night falls, a horror rises from the depths to drag down unwary vessels...
What's been eatin' the squid, then? This spot used to be swarmin' with 'em.
Bloody hells, it's comin' down in buckets. This'll rile up the schools...
Bait your hook for fish of middling size. You'll thank me later.
Saw an unlikely creature in the water earlier this morning─thought I might still be dreamin'.
Little insects are the ticket to some extraordinary catches. Trust me.
Ugh, it's like sailin' through a damn waterfall. Just the kind of weather <var 1A 02 /var>they<var 1A 01 /var> like to hunt in...
Careful, now. There's some big, mean buggers that swim in these parts, and they ain't shy about comin' up for a bite!
Sometimes after dusk, you hear it echo across the water...a grindin', crackin', crunchin' kind of sound.
I hear the beaches hereabouts are strewn with bits of shattered shells.
Some fish love swimmin' about in a thunderstorm. It's like they're just darin' a bolt to strike!
No one knows why, but big catches and spectral currents often go hand in hand. What's the ocean tellin' us, I wonder?
Around here the risin' sun brings big fish, lookin' for a meal. Wouldn't want to miss breakfast.
A master fisher once told me that he owed his success to the sack of fresh mackerel he always kept close at hand.
I can barely tell the sea from the rain! Those little buggers love swimmin' in a downpour, though...
Stands to reason that to catch a small fish, you need even smaller bait!
I've heard whispers that a pair of Ruby Dragons prowl these waters at night. Always wanted to see 'em with my own eyes.
Glass dragons aren't known to suffer competition. If you want to draw one out, make it think a rival's encroachin' on their territory.
Storm like this, I'd bet a sack o' gil that a certain fish is on the prowl...
Keep your wits about you in these waters. The fish might not look it, but they can pull that rod right out of your hands!
Sailors say that when night falls, you can see a volcano come to life on the ocean floor, like a single red eye openin' in the darkness.
Squid are a common sight around here, as are the things that come to hunt 'em.
Sometimes you have to get soakin' wet to have a chance at catchin' the best fish.
Brace yourselves against something sturdy. The big bastards in these waters like to give passin' boats a love tap from time to time.
Sailors passin' through these parts have told stories of an undersea flower bed in full bloom.
The plum trees are a sight to behold─if you can ignore the bugs swarmin' around them, that is.
Chase down those birds and nab them in your nets!
Use birdlime to slow them down!
Be gentle with the birds, okay!?
Thank you, friend! You're a lifesaver!
Please lend us your aid again!
How many more are still out there!?
Get back here already, will you!?
Am I in the right place for the procession?
The eggs are ready. Let the festivities begin!
Heh. Today's smilin' children are tomorrow's loyal customers.

Are you ready, my friends? The parade is about to begin!
We make for the Lancers' Guild! Come one, come all!
Spriggans!? Why does it always have to be spriggans...
Show some spirit! It's Hatching<var 1F /var>tide, after all!

Over here! No child must go home empty-handed!
Our work here is done! Time to move on!
Prepare the presents! The children await!

Spriggy say less talky, more givy!
Alright, already! Just get your bloody paws off me!
I could swear I've heard that voice somewhere...
Mister Rabbit! Missus Rabbit! Do you have an egg for me!?
And me! I want an egg, too!
No dilly-dallying! We must move on!
The Lancers' Guild is up ahead. Just a bit further now!
The procession is almost at an end. How many children smiled because of you today?
There's only one thing these savages are good for...
This marks the end of the procession!
Be proud, my friends, for you have made many a child happy this day!

We're buildin' the Mattock, and to begin with, we need to clear away the debris!

Help yourselves to the supplies, and let's see the stage finished!

By now it goes without sayin', but the job calls for precision, so let's keep it nice and tidy!

Let's give it absolutely everything we've got and finish on a high note!
Deft of paw, with kin do I vie.

With fearsome fang, I travel with pack.
For peace our land shall never lack.

Mayhaps 'twas Bismarck with whom I ought have bargained...

Such ease of motion despite his size─it's truly a wonder.

The force of it...'twas nigh overwhelming.

We are fated to happen upon strange abominations, apparently.

Might similar creatures dwell beneath the seas of the Source?

In channeling aether through the crystal... Hmm.

An impressive concept, to be certain.
An impressive concept, to be certain.

Why, this... This could take a lifetime to study...
There may be still more out of sight.
Though I mislike this, we may as well have done with it.

Yonder queen standeth as more than symbol to her soldiers. Have caution.
Though I mislike this, we may as well have done with it.

For the sake of our world!
In the name of the Light!
To the ashes whence you came!

Just as our scouts reported. We'll hit them hard and fast!
Like an eagle amongst the hares!
