We hope you enjoyed that veritable parade of oversized stuffed toys. The next fête is “Shear-a-Yak,” and it will be held at Bright Ballad's Passage!
Though you'll be shearing a yak in this fête, instead of shears, you'll be using an enhanced version of the aetheromatic auger: the aetheromatic clipper!
Tuned to operate with normal concentrations of aether, it shoots blasts of magicked wind that effortlessly removes fleece from their owners!
So get firing at the yak, and bring the fleece it sheds to me, three sacks full at a time!
That's all for “Shear-a-Yak.” Now, please take yourselves to the Abacus for the next fête: “Toy Hunter”!
My swinelings have hidden a lucky toy in one of three present boxes.
You must open the right box to find the toy, and then bring it to me.
Great hunting, everyone. Now, please make your way to the central plaza on the Mattock!
I bid you welcome to the final fête: “Presents of Mind”!
In this fête, you must deliver presents to various folk on the Mattock according to the mascots' instructions.
Upon delivering two presents, the mascot issuing the instructions will change, so be sure to pay attention. Let the gifting begin!
It's farewell for now, but we look forward to seeing you again! Till next time!
Nothing up my sleeves─save my muscular arms─and presto! We have materials!
Just a moment while we prepare.
Hm, perhaps I need a speech quirk like “kupo” as well...
Wind direction─check. Wind speed─check. Everything is in order!
Thank you for your patience! The fête will now begin!
Heh heh, our wooly friend looks like a new yak!
Now it's time for me and my swinelings to get to work!
My massive muscles will make short work of the tidying up.
It's time to hide the toy.
Speech quirks are for the weak...kupo.
This is it, everyone─the final fête.
We mascots are all taking part this time.
Have fun with us till the end!
The final fête is upon us. Are you ready, my dear mascots?
Let us finish on a high note!
We hope you had as much fun as we did!
Looks like this goes all the way up.
Hear ye, hear ye! Fêtes are about to commence!
Greetings, friends, and thank you for joining in the Skyrise Celebration!
Today, we will be hosting a variety of fêtes─the first of which serves as an introduction to our friendly team of mascots.
Mighty Moogle, at your service, kupo. Made of sterner stuff though I am, I'm in charge of the fête “Made of Softer Stuff”!
Chirpy Chocobo is my name, and “Shear-a-Yak” is my game. Under my fluffy wing, you will shear as you've never shorn before!
And last but definitely not least, I am Perky Piggy. My swinelings and I look forward to making a “Toy Hunter” out of you!
Remember these mascots well, for they will be your guides throughout the revelry. On which note, let us dive into the fête!
The mascots will take turns striking their favorite poses, and we ask that you show your celebratory spirit by posing in kind.
Here is a pose that maximizes your muscular appeal.
Do the <var 1A 02 /var>mighty maximizer<var 1A 01 /var>, and show the fine specimen that you are, kupo!
Before using the aetheromatic clipper, it is important to point and acknowledge.
To that end, we do the <var 1A 02 /var>chirpy checker<var 1A 01 /var>!
When searching for treasure, one must keep one's eyes peeled.
To help you practice, I bid you do the <var 1A 02 /var>perky peeler<var 1A 01 /var> with me!
Hereon, the order will be random.
Before using the aetheromatic clipper, point and acknowledge with the <var 1A 02 /var>chirpy checker<var 1A 01 /var>!
When searching for treasure, keep your eyes peeled with the <var 1A 02 /var>perky peeler<var 1A 01 /var>!
Show the fine specimen that you are with the <var 1A 02 /var>mighty maximizer<var 1A 01 /var>, kupo!
I trust you are now acquainted with our friendly mascots. With that, let us move right along to the next fête.
Mighty Moogle, whose big muscles are equaled only by his big heart, awaits you on the Mattock for “Made of Softer Stuff”!
I am Pagaga, beastmaster of the proud line of Vochstein!
Are there any out there with stones enough to face me and my pets!?
...You lot? Ahahaha! I was expecting something a little sterner, but very well! Let's see how you fare!
Come, Berda! Obda! I've found you some playmates!
Away, Obda! I won't have you dying on me!
To think that my prized beasts could be bested...
Grrr... We'll get you next time! Mark my words!
Hmph, this the best the Resistance's got? Lyon's fallen far to struggle against your ilk.
What? These monsters were once your allies!?
They were once, but they are far past saving. He says killing them would be a mercy. I'm of the same mind, Kosyu─let's end this, and quickly.
Impudent rebels. You are hardly worthy to lay eyes upon my masterwork. Grovel for the chance I've afforded you!
Now, my puppets, dance and leave the world agog with your grace!
O, earth beneath me, heed my call! Rise up and crush these Resistance vermin into so much dust!
It is time to show what you can do, my minion. Go forth and crush the Resistance underfoot!
Hmph, we'll shatter it like the ice it is!
We need waste no more time on this rabble.
Let us save our strength for the next mission.
Owww, that hurts! Seriously, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you're a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> after my own heart!
<pant> Bugger me, where did my strength go...?
Fight harder, you lot! Fight harder!
We must free them! Target the constricting flames!
Resistance scum. Finally, you show yourselves...
Come, my new and improved Dabog! Show these fools the power of Delta Gabriel Kai!
It is Dabog inside that golden machina? Gods have mercy...
This is hyperpilot Dabog. Target confirmed. Commencing combat operations...
This is hyperpilot Dabog. Hull damage...confirmed. Firepower...below acceptable parameters.
Deploying long-range assault nodes... Initiating omnidirectional attack...
This is hyperpilot Dabog. Hull integrity...compromised. Proceeding with combat operations...
You would do well not to underestimate us!
Such firepower! Retreat, I say... Retreat!
From the savior's own hands... Such an honor this is!
<gasp> These are the latest tools! However did you know?
What might this be? ...Oho, new masonry tools!
Thank you! I will treasure this!
Ooh, birch syrup, and quality stuff to boot!
Heh heh, I shall enjoy this with my tea!
But this is so much! Are you certain?
<gasp> I've always wanted a toy gaelicat!
Thank you! Hehe, I like festivals!
I do not see any primals...
We were fortunate on this occasion...
Oh my. So many lambs to lead to the slaughter.
Centurion Gilbrisbert, storied among the IVth Legion, at your service. Do you know why they call me the puppetmaster?
Ah, but it is not for the puppets to know wherefore the hand pulls their strings. They are only to move at its command.
You'd be a fool to fight us. 'Tis plain you're outnumbered!
Lay down your arms, and we can end this without bloodshed!
What is he blathering on about?
I wield but a fragment of a relic wrested from the earth of Dalmasca. Even so, thanks to my ingenious experimentation, I believe you can agree that to behold its power is quite life altering!
We have what we came for! Well done, all of you!
We've dealt the IVth a great blow!
This ceruleum will keep us for a long while!
Take as much ceruleum as possible!
This is where we make our stand!
It's going to explode! Run for your lives!
What's this? A real challenge? Very well, there is no threat that more puppets cannot answer.
Allow the aether to flow through your veins, and offer up your very bodies to the safety of your master!
Excellent idea, Kosyu! We must focus on the surrounding fiends before aught else!
Oh, my beautiful puppets. You are lovely even in your demise.
But this is not <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> end. I have such grand designs yet in store... Hehehe! Hah hah haha!
We may have staved off their assault, but the head of the snake yet lives. The puppetmaster, he called himself...
He says we must kill him next time, or the blood of his victims will be on our hands. I do not disagree.
Heehee! What a fabulous performance! The Resistance is crushed under the unyielding boots of my puppets!
However, there is yet more my talents can achieve. The world waits with bated breath for my magnum opus, and I must not disappoint!
Ugh... We didn't stand a chance. Where did that puppetmaster come from?
He says we must kill him next time, or the blood of his victims will be on our hands. I do not disagree.
The fiends come, but fear not! Thracie stands with you!
Just look at that! So pretty they are, and so frosty─icy, freezy, frosty!
On my honor as an adventurer, I will quell this icy menace!
You beasts won't stop us from celebrating the season!
Don't hurt yourself out there, Brother!
Knock those Bombards out of the sky!
Well, if it isn't Llofii! So kind of you to come all this way to take part in my research...
Fabineau! Plotting another sick experiment, I see. Well, it ends today!
Test subject secured. Let the experiment begin...
We will begin with the summoning ritual. Of course, this will require a suitable sacrifice...
In serving my research, their deaths will serve a greater purpose than their pathetic lives ever could!
How many innocent creatures must die to serve your crazed thirst for forbidden knowledge!?
Such a noble beast... Look how it fears not death... Now, shall we begin?
Aether charge confirmed...precisely according to my hypothesis. Yes, these results should bear fruit...
Have you no respect for life whatsoever!?
If you disapprove, why not stop me with your own magic? Of course, that, too, is born from sacrifice...
This cannot be! My magicks...are all powerful! My research...must go on...!
At long last... Fabineau will conduct his cruel experiments no more.
And yet...no doubt many innocent creatures remain trapped in his research facility.
I must not rest until all are saved from a horrific fate...
Turn tail and run back to your precious Resistance... And tell them Fabineau has made another breakthrough!
It's no use... Fabineau's magicks are too powerful...
I am Pagaga, queen of beasts! Show yourself, Resistance worms!
“The girl...she seems different than before,” you say? We had best be wary, then...
At any rate, it would seem we've been issued a challenge. It wouldn't do for us to turn tail now.
Well, if it isn't the spear girl and the mustachioed muscle-head. This time, you'll pay for dishonoring Father!
On the Vochstein name...I swear I will not fall!
The “Beast King”? Hah! I'll show Lyon who truly deserves to wear the crown!
The Vochsteins are the true rulers of beastkind─now and forever!
Berda, Obda! I told you to stay put! Your wounds are not yet healed...
Berda, how sweet you are! Obda, let us fight as one to the end!
They're tougher than they look. No wonder Lyon felt he'd met his match...
But this Vochstein will not bend so easily!
Next time! Next time, I swear─Pagaga will <var 1A 02 /var>end you<var 1A 01 /var>!
She's a persistent one, isn't she...?
“Big words, but those wounds will keep her from the front lines for some time,” you say? We can only hope so...
Friend or foe, I've no desire to see a girl throw her life away for foolish pride.
Behold! <var 1A 02 /var>This<var 1A 01 /var> is what it means to rule beastkind! <var 1A 02 /var>This<var 1A 01 /var> is the power of the Vochsteins!
Gahaha! I can see Lyon's face. The self-styled Beast King is but a weanling compared to the power of Pagaga!
Our foe is too stubborn today. Let us retreat and regroup while we have the chance...
Ba Go's heart bursts with excitement!
Go boom for Ba Go, my beauties!
Did you see me out there, Sister?
Ba Go's icy pretties! How beautifully you go boom...
Oh, Brother, you were amazing out there!
Ba Go is no match for your beautiful booms...
Brother! Come back to us! Brother!
Are we all going to freeze to death?
Today, victory shall be ours! For Bozja!
The Blades shall be our banner!
Bozjans are more than just warriors. Our strength is your strength!
I shall not fall, so that my allies may see the morrow!
Allow me to be your shield! Stay close!
Masterful ninjutsu takes on many forms!
This is how we fight in Nagxia!
The twin facets of mana are at my beck and call!
I shall forge a path of my own making!
We shall wrest freedom from the clutches of tyrants!
Our oppressors shall pay for their sins!
Today we pave the way to freedom!
Now you know what we're made of!
The imperial army will crumble before us!
The full might of the Empire is helpless before us!
Gaaah! We can go on no longer!
The shame of defeat is bitter indeed...
Ugh... Where did we go wrong?
Is this...where I meet my end?
No... Victory was all but guaranteed...
I was foolish to think I was ready...
Try not to lose any fingers!
Now is the moment to strike.
This bodes ill... We must retreat!
Is this where we meet our fate?
Heh heh heh... You seem to be hard-pressed, my dear Yamatsumi.
Your escape has been cut off. You're trapped.
But worry not, for your salvation has arrived. Speak your heart's most earnest wish to the relic I bear, and the path to it shall open.
Please, Dabog! Come back with us!
<bzzzt> Fools. The thing that stands before you is not Dabog.
I...I have only one wish: to see the onmyoji revived under the flag of a new nation!
Huh? There's a voice...a voice coming from the stone. I can... I─ Ungaaah! GWAAAH!!!
No, it is an organic component─one designed to extract the most out of our weaponry!
Hahaha! Haaahaha! Your wish is the relic's command!
You live now under my flag, puppets to obey my every command! You shall be revived, oh yes, and more majestically than you have ever dreamed!
He's using Yamatsumi as fodder for his summoning!
One evil deed after another, he says. This man seems partial to them.
For Lord Noah... To birth his nation...
Hahaha. A defeat, perhaps, but a fruitful one. I have seen the measure of the relic's strength, and I am not left wanting.
Wh-Who are these men!? Why do they all look like Dabog!?
If Yamatsumi can make such a puissant puppet, what power would the master himself produce?
He has pity for Yamatsumi. I see why... They were given their wish, albeit a warped and twisted version of it.
A cruel fate, even for one so misguided. Such terrifying power should not be in the hands of one so depraved.
We must take every measure to stop him. Muster every last onze of our strength.
Mwahaha! The relic is splendid, absolutely splendid!
We're outmatched! We must retreat and regroup!
Yes, Kosyu. Now is the time for patience. We can fight another day.
I fight in the name of the Vochsteins! My head would make a worthy prize─not that any of you cowards could take it!
We are under attack! Repeat: we are under attack! Requesting air support!
Isn't it obvious? We have succeeded in mass-producing them. Go forth, my enhanced soldiers! Go forth and destroy the enemy!
Damn it, they're too strong! Fall back! Fall back!
The Resistance is withdrawing! Repeat: the Resistance is withdrawing! Much obliged for the air support!
Whatever it is, I've never seen one so big!
Oho, we meet again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Still fighting up a storm, I hear. You really ought to join us. I'd see to it you want for nothing.
But I know a lost cause when I see one, and you can make a man beg only so many times.
Not good... It pains to say this, but we must retreat!
Finally given up on trying to woo our friend, has he?
So, with that out of the way, let's get right to business... You're all chocobo fodder!
Gahahaha, there's nothing like a good rampage!
No hard feelings, eh? At the end of the day, I just need the coin to feed my own.
Such touching concern for his underlings...
Godsdammit... Sorry, but I can't afford to die here. Someone needs to put meat and mead on the table, see?
We'll settle this another time, I promise! So long!
Gahahaha! Victory belongs to the strong, and we're the strongest of all!
If you have a change of heart, just let me know, eh? We can never have too many strong people like you!
Excellent. Let us return to the <var 1A 02 /var>Dalriada<var 1A 01 /var>.
Back to the <var 1A 02 /var>Dalriada<var 1A 01 /var>. Our next mission awaits!
Hah hah! You may think to find comfort in numbers, but they shall all be my puppets!
You there! You appear to be Far Easterners, but you're not one of us. Identify yourselves!
We are the Onmyoji Brotherhood, and fate has ordained that we serve Lord Noah. In his name we shall strike you down.
Hmph, I bloody knew it... To arms! To arms!
Our comrades need help! Look alive!
Reinforcements so soon? Very well, allow us to return the favor. O shikigami! I bid you smite my foes!
Wh-What is that abomination? Have care!
Ugh... It seems I underestimated them...
That my shikigami should be defeated...
And here come the roosters! Keep your distance, or you'll soon wish you had!
Hmph, you may have won the day, but this isn't over. Far from it.
The enemy is fled! Well fought, brothers!
Know the power of the Onmyoji Brotherhood!
Their sorcery is more formidable than I had reckoned... Retreat! Retreat!
How could we lose to the likes of them!?
Remember this victory well, my brothers. For it is the moment we began carving our place in Lord Noah's new nation!
The relic takes hold of your body, and I take a hold of your mind. Ere long, the strings have you bound.
Now dance for me, puppets. Dance, and bring more to my merry troupe!
My...my body...! It's burning... It's buuurning!
<var 1A 02 /var>This<var 1A 01 /var> is the uncouth rabble our glorious legion has struggled so long to eliminate...? How disheartening.
No matter. I am here now, and I shall sweep this field clean of Resistance filth!
Fabineau!? How did─? Why are you in Bozja?
Llofii, my dear! The reports had you pinned as a deserter. Have you come forth to surrender to me, then? To beg my forgiveness?
Never! I will never again align myself with you and your cruel experiments!
It falls to me to cleanse the stain of your betrayal!
You will suffer for the suffering you've inflicted!
Ah, but where are my manners? You really should meet your successor.
I'm sure the two of you will get along splendidly─after all, you do have so much in common!
Allow me to introduce a fellow traitor: Lovro, of Gunnhildr's Blades!
In the name of the queen... All dissidents must perish!
No... This man has been tempered...
My poor, addled Llofii. Our final farewell is at hand.
My queen... I return to your side...
Fabineau was not content to meddle with the monoceros, it seems. He has expanded into other foul spheres of experimentation...
I care not what it costs me─I must put an end to his evil!
My queen! I bring you victory!
That is true power. Remember well this defeat.
I am her shield. I am her sword. The queen's blade is all that I am or wish to be!
Lovro! I had not wanted to believe the reports, but now I see that they spoke true...
Though it pains me to stand against you, my duty is clear!
It is fitting somehow... The techniques that you once taught me shall be the very same I wield to effect your capture!
Mine own red magicks, used against me by an enemy of the queen!
Yet I wonder...have you mastered <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> my secrets? Dare you unleash the fires of the Crimson Scourge!?
No... I've felt this surge of mana before... Back! Everyone back!
Gods above! The tempering has only enhanced his powers...
I cannot fall here. My queen yet has need of me...
For a kindness, at least his body yet remains uncorrupted. We can still... There is still time.
Fear not, my mentor. We will save you from this darkness...
Fall back! His magicks are too strong! We must regroup and reconsider our strategy!
My queen! This victory I seize in your name! Your Majesty's loyal servant returns...
Mark you the weapon he wields? That man is Lovro─one of Gunnhildr's Blades!
You dare face me again, foul pretender to the red mantle!?
Aye, and this time, I will not fail.
I will honor you, my mentor...by subduing you in battle!
Foe to my queen. Prepare to meet your end!
Ugh! ...You truly are a master of the art! Yet I will prove myself the stronger!
I tire of this contest! If you seek my best, then you shall have it!
And I will weather the storm just as you taught me...with heart and steel!
My vital flame feeds the Crimson Scourge!
My aether... How feeble grows its fire...
Quickly, bind him while he is still weak!
<pant> <pant> <pant> It is done, Master Lovro. The healing can begin!
I have...no more aether to give...and yet he still stands!
Victory, my queen! I return to you triumphant!
If you wish to participate in these light-hearted games, please gather at Bright Ballad's Passage.
Artisans of all persuasions can join in the fun and win fabulous prizes!
We eagerly look forward to your participation!
This is the final call for fêtes! If you wish to participate, please hasten to Bright Ballad's Passage.
Come, friends, pray do not dally!
Follow our mascots to the Mattock, where the fête “Made of Softer Stuff” will be held.
The fun and excitement have only just begun!
In charge of this fête is Chirpy Chocobo, who loves all things fluffy and downy.
Our mascots are making their way to the venue as we speak.
If you wish to participate─and surely you do─please follow them to Bright Ballad's Passage!
Quickly, now. As the saying goes, “Good things come to those who <var 1A 02 /var>don't<var 1A 01 /var> wait”!
This time, Perky Piggy and his lovable litter of swinelings will be in charge of the proceedings.
Including the soon-to-commence “Toy Hunter,” but two fêtes remain.
There, the fifth and final fête awaits: “Presents of Mind.”
This being the rousing conclusion, we hope to see every one of you there with bells on!
And that concludes all the fêtes. On behalf of all the residents of the Firmament, we thank you for joining us in the revelry.
The Skyrise Celebration is our way of honoring our esteemed builders while welcoming folk from near and far to our new home.
We hope that we have been able to give back some of the joy we have received, and wish you much and more happiness!
Who would be wandering a battlefield alone...?
You appear to be Bozjan, sir, but how came you to this place?
...Dabog? It is you, is it not? There were reports of your capture two years ago!
This is hyperpilot Dabog. Hostile forces confirmed. Initiating combat.
I recognize that warmachina! ...And now we know who the pilot was.
Dabog is not in his right mind, but he leaves us little choice. Defend yourselves!
Fight their control, Dabog! This is not who you are!
Energy levels dropping. Initiating subroutines. Launching alternative attack patterns.
Dabog! Gods, that machina is a menace!
This is hyperpilot Dabog. Hull integrity compromised. Retreating to base.
Dabog, wait! Let us help you!
Is tempering not abhorrent enough!? Must they seek out new ways to twist and control men's hearts!?
It lies beyond all reason, sir...
Then we must work doubly hard not to lose our own. We stay the course, and hope it also leads to his salvation...
This is hyperpilot Dabog. Hostiles routed. Returning to base.
So this is where those Resistance rats were hiding...
If they relay this information to their superiors, we're done for! Kill them all!
I, too, am a blade of Gunnhildr...and I will do my master proud!
We're under attack! Request aerial support at once!
Fire at will! Reduce them to ashes!
M-Master...did you see that!? Your student has done you proud!
So you are one of Gunnhildr's Blades, yes? Thank you for kindly volunteering this information.
Hah! Spying from the comfort of magitek armor, I see. Next time, we cross blades on the battlefield!
Our attacks barely scathe them. Oh, Master, whatever shall I do!?
R-Right... We must live to fight another day. Retreat! Retreat, I say!
Allow us to even the odds!
You couldn't have picked a better moment!
Thank you, my friends! Let us put an end to the Empire's villainy!
We will send him to Gangos!
The fête “Made of Softer Stuff” is currently underway on the Mattock.
Don't miss this chance to craft adorably large stuffed toys!
Hurry, friends! Time is almost up!
The fête “Made of Softer Stuff” will soon conclude.
If you still have a toy, please hurry and deliver it to the wain!
To assist us in distributing rewards, please remain in your artisan's attire until you have received yours.
Be on your guard. I will speak with this lost lamb.
The fête “Shear-a-Yak” is currently being held at Bright Ballad's Passage. Join us in the fun and reap─or should I say, <var 1A 02 /var>shear<var 1A 01 /var>─the rewards!
I trust your clippers are firing well─our mascots are meticulous with their maintenance!
Lest you worry for your safety, I assure you our wooly friend has been rendered docile with a feast of his favorite fodder.
If you still have fleece, please hurry and deliver it to Chirpy Chocobo!
To assist us in distributing rewards, please remain in your artisan's attire until you have received yours.
The fête “Toy Hunter” is underway on the Abacus. Seek and you will find, participate and you will receive─prizes, that is!
The rules are simple: open the right present box to find the lucky toy, and see it to Perky Piggy's hands.
The fête “Toy Hunter” is underway on the Abacus. It isn't too late to participate and receive prizes!
If you find yourself turned into a cute little piggy, fret not. The magick swiftly wears off.
The hunt is drawing to a close. How many lucky toys have you found thus far?
The fête “Toy Hunter” will soon conclude.
Loath though I am to disappoint, you can't take the lucky toys home with you. Please deliver them to Perky Piggy.
To assist us in distributing rewards, please remain in your artisan's attire until you have received yours.
The fête “Presents of Mind” is currently taking place on the Mattock.
Take the presents the mascots have prepared, and see them delivered to the right people!
The fête “Presents of Mind” is currently taking place on the Mattock.
Such delight writ upon the faces of the recipients! Come, let's keep up the gift giving!
Hurry, friends! Not long now until the gift giving must come to an end!
The fête “Presents of Mind” will soon conclude.
Time is almost up, friends. Please deliver your last presents.
As today's excitement draws to a close, may we say what wonderful participants you have all been!
If none of them are Dabog, what have you done with him!?
Ah yes, subject VIII. He was a truly exceptional prototype.
Alas, his flesh eventually succumbed to the rigors of testing. Controlling such complex machinery takes a heavy toll, you see.
Fortunately, we were able to overcome this problem by means of the VIIth's data extraction technique.
From his combat expertise to his memories, we transferred everything into these enhanced soldiers.
What!? You heartless fiend! Does your depravity know no bounds!?
You will pay for this! We will avenge Dabog!
Impossible... That my enhanced unit should be wiped out...
So be it. I had intended to conduct more tests, but you leave me no choice. Savor your victory while you still can!
It sounds as though he hasn't shown all of his hand yet...
Well, whatever it is he has coming, we'll be ready to fight!
Indeed. We will fight, and we will triumph─for Dabog and everyone we have lost.
Come, my friends. Let us return to the encampment and prepare for the next battle.
Ugh, we cannot contend with such firepower... Fall back! Fall back!
We must retreat while we can!
Urabe-no-Yamatsumi, you thief! Marsak told us where to find you!
What madness has possessed you to abscond with Doma's treasure? To lick the boots of the Empire!?
Thieves? Do you forget your roots, shinobi of Doma? You deserve no explanation, but for the motherland we share, you shall have it.
The priests endured untold suffering under Yotsuyu's iron rule, her ire toward our traditions often turning to wrath.
Only by Legatus Noah's grace did we survive those dark times. Delivering this treasure to him is the least we can do to repay his clandestine efforts to aid us.
And in repaying your debt you would stifle the Bozjans? Think about the full reach of your actions!
Gah... The spirit is willing...but the flesh is bruised and battered...
It is not too late for you, Yamatsumi! We can still return to Doma together! We can return home together!
I swore my life to Legatus Noah! Behold the depth of my loyalty!
We cannot win this battle! Tsubame!
Remember this defeat well, shinobi. As brothers and sisters of Doma, we showed mercy this time. We will not do so again.
You are...much changed. What have those fiends done to you!?
Witness the strength of the IVth Legion!
Victory and glory are ours! Inform command!

Hehe. Now this could be interesting.

Whoever this man is, he seems convinced you're Golbez.

So this is the kingdom of Baron.

Let us leave the other side to him.

Drown them and be done with it!

I try to only speak kindly of others, but they test me...

Unit identification: GX-0090. Commencing patrol of Canal Town.

Alright! Alright! No need to rub it in, now...
I swore to defend this tower with my life... And now...
Without that sweetener, this cycle's crops could fail, and my people starve!
We did it! Er... <var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> did it. And the cargo's safe! Well, most of it, at least.
No! That was the last crate!
I'm sorry, brothers... I have failed you...
...now I'm the one about to be plucked!
Oh, and try not to breathe in any of the spores!
Remember, only the ik'iit ears. The fly agarics are pure poison!
Taste the fury of the mountains!
What potent magic. In that case...
Mark the trajectory of his blades.
Finally, time to go on the offensive!
The way is open. We should hurry.
Right, let's give them a sound thrashing!
Zoraal Ja holds command over all of this?
A red vehicle. An indication of rank, perhaps?
No doubt it's as swift as the others. Have care.
Well, they have good taste in colors, I'll give them that.
They'll have to try harder than that.
Is there no end to their defenses?
This place just keeps getting stranger and stranger.
Everything appears to be made of the same strange substance.
The sooner we can leave this place, the better.
Nowhere to go but forward, it seems...
Hmph. Another hunk of metal for the scrap pile.
Well, well. What have we here?
I was only joking when I said they need to try harder.
This one is rather imposing, isn't it?
How was Zoraal Ja able to conceive of such weaponry?
Let's deal with this quickly and get going!
We'll not be so easily discouraged.
Did they really think this would deter us?
Is this the best they can do?
As if this would stop us.
We must be getting close to an exit.
If it is, we'll be through in no time at all.
So they're all that stands between us and the way out?
This one appears to be human.
An ill wind blows...stirring hearts to madness.
It is all I can do to keep the evil at bay. The creatures of the land, I fear, shall not fare as well.
The Serpentlord's return is closer than I believed.
We must release the poor creatures from evil's embrace!
...but this victory is far from the end.
The alligators will not be the last of the Serpentlord's victims...
...unless we can end the Serpentlord himself.
I shall contemplate, and return once I have been shown the path.
Perhaps the Landsguard will fare better...
The land here bears many wounds, and its blood rises to the surface to harden like a scab...
...as the elementals gather to dance in its everlasting glow.
It is with that blood that I shall exact my revenge.
Much of the land's blood will be needed to summon the Serpentlord.
Yes, I do believe this will suffice. You have done my people a great service today, traveler.
And once again, I have failed...
But I am not beaten. I will be back tomorrow, and the next day. For the next hundred days, if that is what it takes!
Travelers! I call upon you to aid me in my search for the Blood of the Land, and together we might vanquish the Serpentlord once and for all!
We won't forget these children. Not ever.
Then we break them. This one first!
To me! Brace for the worst!
This is not at all like the Garleans or the Allagans.
Are we still in their encampment?
Who could have built all this?
I daresay we've not seen its like before.
Endless strength or not, victory will be ours!
Is that the Skyruin's true strength, then?
Again with the ambient aether...? Its energies are inexhaustible!
We're barely halfway. The real climb starts from here!
And we're barely halfway. The real climb starts from here!
The ambient aether is dense enough to form crystals...
Evidence of how dense this ambient aether must be.
An arcane entity of some kind?
Must be a snow spirit! Not that I've ever seen one.
I feel chilled to the bone...
Phew. It was tougher than it looked.
There better not be any more of those.
Sorry to trespass, but this is the only way through!
It doesn't look pleased to see us up here...
That's the bird that attacked the giants!
Yes, and it doesn't look pleased to see us...
Heh... That was barely a challenge!
Better watch your step─that's a long drop!
Great sunken gods! We're so high up!
If it's a fight he wants, then let's give it to him!
Goodness, he must be twice the size of the other Yok Huy!
So that's the High Luminary... He... He's huge!
We'll clear the way, don't you worry!
Just leave the fighting to us!
How did it come to this...?
The sight alone is hard to bear...
It's heartbreaking just to look at...
The asps of Shaaloani are a greedy lot, forever feeding off the land's lifeblood.
They will be drawn to the crystal we have gathered like flies to a corpse.
When they emerge is when we strike. Slay the Serpentlord's spawn that he may know the anguish felt by his victims.
Vile lord of serpents! Look upon the land and see it drown in the lifeblood of your kin!
Do not allow the asps to retreat to the sands with the crystal!
The asps' cries have died, and land long dry has been churned to mud.
The Serpentlord will not allow this affront to go unpunished. He will seek revenge.
And we will be ready. But first, we must wait.
The Serpentlord need not rise while his children writhe.
And writhe they do, their bellies full on the Blood of the Land.
But I shall not relent. As long as the Serpentlord draws breath, I will find a way to end him!
Oh, to get just a glimpse of her!
The princess's airship is coming to Victors' March!
We have done all that we can─silenced his heralds, sacrificed his children. The trap is laid. The tural vidraal stirs.
Rise, O lord of the serpents! He who dwells beneath the shifting sands and would swallow all creation. Feel the blood of your kin wet on your scales and rage!
Know the sorrow you have sown and rise to reap your revenge! We await your return with bated breath...and blades drawn.
O fallen kin! May you now and forever rest in peace.
And you, my friends! Tales of the day's deeds will be sung by my people till the sun no longer rises and the moon no longer weeps. You will <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> be forgotten.
Nothing is going to stop us!
It seems the security level has increased.
It's at once beautiful and sad...
Souls truly are just a resource here...
You do not want to become lost here.
I don't like the feel of this... Let's proceed with care.
Doesn't look like it'll let us through.
That is no ordinary mechanical soldier!
Just one last push to the top!
So this will take us above...
What will we find here, I wonder.
The air somehow feels colder here...
We have to stop them from being misused.
It's chilling to see souls treated with such indifference.
The aberrance is reminiscent of the Allagan Empire.
Feral souls... I can't get used to the idea...
How could you twist a living creature like that?
Mechanical augmentation... This wouldn't have been amiss in Allag.
It appears to be enhanced with electrope!
I don't know why, but I suddenly feel a chill...
Something feels seriously off about this one...
Oh gods... His aura...it's so very wrong...
Focus, Krile! It's time to fight!
A shame this elevator doesn't go straight to the top.
Let us stay on our guard.
Gah, my head can't keep up!
It changes tactics by rearranging itself!
Have care on the weapon side!
The piece on its back has separated!
Want to get us from all directions, eh?
Is this Alexandria as it was when she lived?
A virtual domain generated by her memories...
The people really did love her.
Even the citizens have been recreated.
She truly was the people's princess...
Even back then she was close to her people...
All is right in the world...
To think that she is right there...
Whatever this is, it's going down!
The system is intervening directly in the memories...
There will be more interference. Let us remain vigilant.
Huh? Is this is still Alexandria?
What in the world has happened...?
I daresay we are come to a different time.
I know this is only a memory, but still...
This is the culmination of the Storm Surge...
This feels so real, it hurts not to help them...
This is only a memory... It's all in the past now...
I can't help but remember the future I lived...
I know... I need to remind myself it's only a memory...
That airship is shielding the other!
Whatever bars our way, we'll brush aside!
It matters not what bars our way!
<pant> Need a moment to catch my breath...
Another obstacle out of the way.
Are we in a different time again?
It appears to be the same place...
The war appears to have ended...
The memory banks have become unstable.
I have a bad feeling about this... Let's hurry!
The system itself may have become unstable.
It's not because of us, is it?
Let's keep a close eye on that sword and fist.
We'll find her as soon as we've dealt with this!
It's employing countermeasures against Cahciua's program!
